item.text: @#/ /sgrub pa'i thabs mdor byas pa/ @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ piN+Da bi d+hi sA d+ha naM / bod skad du/ sgrub pa'i thabs mdor byas pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khams gsum spyod pa las grol
mkha' dang mnyam gyur dngos po'i ngo bo nyid/ /dag cing zhi la rnam dben mchog zhi rang bzhin rnal 'byor pa nyid yul/ /rtogs dka' brtag par dka' la bdag gzhan rab phan khyab cing mtshan ma med/ /
rgyal ba'i bde ba mnyam med mnyam sku mi rtog tshul gcig la phyag 'tshal/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi ni/ /mdor bsdus rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /sems can kun la phan bskyed pa'i/ /mdor
bsdus bdag gis bshad par bya/ /rnam rtog bag chags nyes pa yis/ /'gro ba gsum po rnam rmongs la/ /blo dang ldan pas legs bltas te/ /rnal 'byor rgyud kyis sbyang bar bya/ /'dod pa lnga ni
yongs spangs nas/ /dka' thub kyis ni gdung med par/ /rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs la/ /bde bas byang chub sgrub par bya/ /des na 'di na sdom gnas yin/ /rtag tu mi phyed brtul zhugs
gang / /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /sgrub pa dag kyang brtsam par bya/ /dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs ni/ /me tog 'bras bu sogs kyis brgyan/ /ri bo dben pa dag tu ni/ /dngos grub thams
cad bsdus pa bsgrub/ /'jam pa'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung legs gnas te/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /gnas bsrung ba ni bsam par bya/ /'bar ba'i 'od 'phro 'jigs par

byed/ /nyi ma la gnas hUM las byung / /g.yon brkyang pa yi gnas pas gnas/ /khro bo bcu ni spro bar bya/ /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rtse mo ni/ /rim pa bzhin du bsam par bya/ /bgegs kun rnam par gzhig pa'i

phyir/ /gnod mdzes bka' stsal phur bus gdab/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ /gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga bAn bid+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ khro bo'i gzugs can 'di yis ni/ /bgegs kyi dbang po

nyid bkug nas/ /blo dang ldan pas sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga bzhin du phur bus gdab/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che/ /ut+pal sngon po 'dab ma'i mdog /'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa/ /rdo rje phur bu rnam par bsgom/ /lte

ba'i phyogs nas smad kyi cha/ /rtse mo lta bur rnam par bsam/ /stod ni khro bo'i dbyibs can te/ /zhal gsum phyag drug lta bur bsgom/ /de yi gsang sngags legs brjod la/ /bgegs kyi tshogs la 'og gzigs pas/ /rdo rje phur bu des btab na/ /bgegs kyi lus

ni mi g.yo 'gyur/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba du Sh+TaM phaT phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT phaT hUM hUM hUM/ badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha ro A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ sarba bi g+h+nA na/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta/ badzra kI la ya hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ rdo rje thob phyag bsnams pa'i/ /gnod mdzes rgyal po

rnam par bsam/ /rdo rje me yis kun du ni/ /rnam par 'phro bas nges par bsgom/ /gdug pa tshig pa phan tshun du/ /'bros par gyur par rnam par bsam/ /phyogs bcur phus bus btab nas ni/ /steng 'og yang dag byin gyis brlab/ /dam pa'i don du dngos po rnams/ /srid

gsum dngos po med par bsgom/ /dngos po med la bsgom pa'i dngos/ /bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min/ /de ltar dngos po dngos med pas/ /bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o/ /tshigs bcad 'di yis rgyu mi rgyu'i/ /bdag nyid can rnams stong par bsgom/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di

yis ni/ /ye shes sa gzhir byin gyis brlab/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /hUM gnyis sa bon yaM las byung / /rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /hUM gnyis sa bon raM las byung / /rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /me yi dkyil

'khor nyid kyang ni/ /de yi steng du rnam par bsam/ /hUM gnyis sa bon baM las byung / /rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor nyid kyang ni/ /de yi steng du rnam par bsam/ /hUM gnyis sa bon laM las byung / /rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor

nyid dang ni/ /de yi steng du rnam par bsam/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po yang dag bsdu/ /rdo rje sa yi dkyil 'khor la/ /der ni b+h+rUM las byung ba yi/ /gzhal yas khang ni rnam par bsgom/ /zur bzhi dang ni sgo bzhi dang / /rta babs bzhi yis mdzes byas pa/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag

ldan/ /ka ba brgyad kyis yang dag mdzes/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pa dang / /rdo rje nor bu zla phyed brgyan/ /grwa yi mtshams ni thams cad dang / /sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis sbras/ / bum pa ka ba rdo rje che/ /bre la phreng bar rim

bzhin gnas/ /ba dan dril bus mdzes byas la/ /rnga yab sogs kyis rnam par brgyan/ /bdag nyid phyag rgyar ldan pa ni/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can/ /in+d+ra nI la'i 'od mnyam pa/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su bsgom par bya/ /rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen dang / /'od

dpag med dang las kyi rgyal/ /zhal gsum phyag drug lta bur ni/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su bsam/ /gti mug dga' sogs lha mo rnams/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can/ /me yi phyogs nas brtsams nas su/ /rim ba ji bzhin nges par dgod/ /de bzhin

gzugs rdo rje la sogs/ /phyi yi mtshams ni rnam pa bzhir/ /reg bya rdo rje nyid kyang ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang ldan gnas/ /byams pa sa yi snying po dag /shar gyi snam bur dgod par bya/ /phyag na rdo rje mkha' snying po/ /brtul zhugs can gyis lho ru dgod/ /'jig rten dbang

phyug 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /nub tu yang ni dgod par bya/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel dang / /kun du bzang po byang phyogs su/ /gshin rje gshed ni shar gyi sgor/ /gzhan gyis mi thub lho phyogs su/ /nub phyogs su ni rta mgrin te/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa byang du'o/ /mi g.yo

'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / /dbyug sngon dang ni stobs po che/ /shar lho mtshams sogs nas brtsams te/ /rim pa ji bzhin bsgom par bya/ /gnod mdzes rgyal po khro bo che/ /de yi 'og tu rnam par bsam/ /gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur rgyal yang / /de bzhin steng du rnam par

bsgom/ /cho ga ji bzhin dkyil 'khor pa/ /de ltar lhag par mos bsams nas/ /slar yang kha sbyar sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi lus la de rnams gzhug /lus kyi 'khor lo rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rim pa ji bzhin yang dag bsam/ /don dam pa yi rdo rje yis/ /de bzhin nyid la

gzhug bya bas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad na/ /dngos grub rab mchog thob par 'gyur/ /'di don rdo rje phreng ba las/ /gsal bar ji bzhin rnam phye ste/ /gzugs phung rtog dang me long dang / /sa khams mig gi dbang po dang / /gzugs dang rnam lngar gyur pa ste//

khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /tshor ba'i phung po mnyam nyid dang / /chu khams rna ba'i dbang po dang / /sgra dang rnam lngar gyur pa ste/ /khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /'du shes so sor rtog pa dang / /byin za sna yi dbang po dang / /dri dang rnam lngar gyur pa ste/ /khro bo gnyis dang

yang dag ldan/ /'du byed bya ba grub pa dang / /rlung khams lce yi dbang po dang / /ro dang rnam lngar gyur pa ste/ /khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /steng 'og khro bo shin tu bcas/ /rang bzhin gyis ni snang ba nyid/ /rnam shes phung por zhugs pa ste/ /rnam shes kyang ni 'od gsal

ba'o/ /mya ngan 'das bcas kun stong dang / /chos kyi skur yang bshad pa yin/ /brtan par bya ba'i don du ni/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ 'di ni don dam dkyil 'khor te/ /snang ba med cing mtshan nyid med/ /don dam bden

pa zhes bya ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /'od gsal bar ni rab zhugs nas/ /ldang ba yang ni bstan par bya/ /sngags kyi sku yi sbyor ba yis/ /lha yi gzugs la dmigs par 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par

bya/ /sngags pas de yi steng du yang / /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam/ /der ni pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /kha dog dmar po bsgom par bya/ /pad+ma'i steng du sngags chen po/ /yi ge gsum ni de nas bsam/ /sngags dang pad+ma nyi ma dag /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs pas/ /zla

ba'i dkyil 'khor kun rdzogs 'gyur / /byang chub sems su rnam par brtag /rgyu dang mi rgyu thams cad kyang / /de nyid du ni rnam bsam zhing / /brtan par bya ba'i don du ni/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de ltar sbyor ba dmigs

nas su/ /rjes su sbyor ba brtsam par bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yis yig gsum yang / /zla ba'i dbus su rnam par bsam/ /de nas yig gsum las byung ba/ /kun da zla ba dkar dang mtshungs/ /dang po mgon po bsams nas kyang / /shin tu

sbyor ba yang dag brtsam/ /mi bskyod pa ni rjes zhugs pas/ /zhal gsum phyag drug 'bar ba dang / /in+d+ra nI la'i 'od mnyam pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma ni/ /g.yas pa'i phyag tu rnam par bsam/ /dril bu rin chen ral gri ni/ /g.yon

pa'i phyag tu bsam par bya/ /de nas phung po la sogs pa'i/ /dbye ba shes pas snang mdzad sogs/ /gnod mdzes bar du sa bon gyis/ /dgod pas yang dag nyid du dgod/ /rnam snang mdzad kyi sa bon ni/ /kha dog dkar po yi ge oM/ /gzugs phung ngo bo nyid kyis ni/ /sngags shes

pas ni spyi bor dgod/ /AH ni mgon po 'od dpag med/ /'du shes phung po'i ngo bo nyid/ /mdog dmar kha la bsams nas ni/ /ngag gi dbang phyug nyid thob 'gyur/ /mi bskyod pa yi yi ge hUM/ /rab tu bzang po'i mthing shun mdog /rnam shes phung po'i ngo bo nyid/ /sngags pas

snying gar rnam par dgod/ /rin chen mgon po'i yi ge swA/ /tshor ba'i phung po'i ngo bo nyid/ /tshor ba dag gi rgyu can ni/ /kha dog ser po lte bar dgod/ /rkang pa gnyis la yi ge hA/ /'du byed phung po'i ngo bo nyid/ /las kyi mgon po de nyid ni/ /sngags pas kha dog ljang gur dgod/

gti mug dga' sogs sngags kyis ni/ /sa la sogs la rab tu gzhug /sra dang gsher dang dro ba dang / /rlung sogs der ni rim pa bzhin/ /th+liM mig tu bkod nas ni/ /sa yi snying po rnam par bsgom/ /oM ni rna ba dag la dgod/ /phyag na rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /oM ni sna la rab bkod

de/ /nam mkha'i snying po rab tu bsgom/ /AH ni lce la bkod nas ni/ /'jig rten dbang po brtag par bya/ /yid la hUM ni bsams nas su/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu bsgom/ /yi ge oM ni lus kun la/ /bsgoms nas sgrib sel dran par bya/ /yi ge mai ni rtsar bzhag ste//

byams pa nyid du yongs su brtag /tshigs kun la ni saM bkod de/ /kun tu bzang po bsam par bya/ /lag pa g.yas par gshin rje gshed/ /g.yon par gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /rta mgrin kha la bsam par bya/ /rdo rje la ni bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /dpung pa g.yas par mi

g.yo mgon/ /g.yon par 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o/ /pus mo g.yas par bsam pa ni/ /dbyug pa sngon po cher 'bar ba/ /pus mo g.yon par stobs po che/ /spyi bor gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur/ /gnod mdzes rgyal po bsam pa ni/ /rkang pa gnyis la dgod par bya/ /dgod

byas de nas sngags pa yis/ /phung po la sogs cho ga bzhin/ /sku yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs gyur nas/ /sbyor ba chen po yang dag brtsam/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag rdzogs/ /spyi bo'i dbus su rnam par bsam/ /der ni yi ge oM dkar po/ /'od zer lnga ni rab 'phro ba'o//

de las lha mo dbyung ba ni/ /bdag po dang ni rab sbyor ba'i / /spyan ni du ma bsams nas ni/ /nam mkha' thams cad rab tu dgang / /de nas sku yi rdo rje ni/ /nam mkha' gang bar legs gnas pa/ /de dbus bdag po bsgom pa ni/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang zhing / /dpe byad

bzang po brgyad cus brgyan/ /bdag kyang de yi mdun gnas la/ /de nas sngags pas tshigs bcad 'di/ /gnyis brjod nas ni gsol ba gdab/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje sku ni mdzad du

gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje sku ni mdzad du gsol/ /spyan dang lhan cig ldan pa yi/ /rnam par snang mdzad bsams nas su/ /de bcug nas ni byin brlabs te/ /

sku yi byin gyis brlab pa brtsam/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin/ /phung po lnga yis rab gang ba/ /sangs rgyas sku yi ngo bo yis/ /bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ AH ni kha dog dmar ldan pas / /lce yi pad+mar rnam

bsams te/ /gos dkar zhes bya nam mkha' ru/ /spros nas nam mkha'i khams rnams dgang / /gsung gi rdo rje'i sngags pa ni/ /nam mkha'i dbus na bzhugs pa la/ /de nas sngags pas tshigs bcad 'di/ /gnyis brjod nas ni gsol ba gdab/

chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje gsung du mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje

gsung du mdzad du gsol/ /gos dkar mo dang lhan cig nyid/ /rang gi gtso bor yang dag ldan/ /lce la zhugs par rab bsams te/ /gsung gi byin gyis brlab pa brtsam/ /rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang yin/ /nges pa'i tshig ni phun sum tshogs/ /bdag gi tshig kyang de 'dra zhing / /chos

'dzin pa dang 'dra bar shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ sngags pas snying gar nyi ma yi/ /gzugs brnyan 'bar ba bsam bya ste/ /der ni mthing shun lta bu yi/ /'od zer lngar ldan hUM dgod do/ /de las lha mo mA ma kI/ /tshogs dang bcas pa dbyung bar bya/ /de bzhin

thugs kyi rdo rje bsgom/ /de la sngon bzhin gsol ba gdab/ /dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje thugs su mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed

gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje thugs su mdzad du gsol/ /mA ma kI tshogs ma lus pa/ /rdo rje thugs dang yang dag ldan/ /snying gar yang ni bcug nas su/ /thugs kyi byin gyis brlab pa brtsam/ /kun du bzang po'i thugs gang yin/ /

gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa/ /bdag kyang de dang 'dra gyur cig /rdo rje 'dzin dang mtshungs par shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de ltar rigs gsum dbye ba yis/ /so sor byin gyis brlabs nas ni/ /blo dang ldan pas gsang sngags 'dis/ /slar yang

thams cad bdag nyid bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de ltar bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /mtshan ma drug dang yang dag ldan/ /dam tshig sems dpa' bsgom par bya/ /snying ga'i dbus su phra mo

yi/ /ye shes sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /ting 'dzin sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i/ /yi ge hUM ni de ru dgod/ /sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can/ /de ltar sbyor ba cher bskyed nas/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /sgrub pa chen po brtsam par bya/ /gzugs bzang

gzhon pas brgyan pa ni/ /sme sha can ni bdag nyid che/ /bu mo ut+pal mthing ga'i mdog /mig yangs dam pa rnyed nas ni/ /mnyam par bzhag cing legs par bslab/ /sgrub pa po la shin tu mos/ /oM ni spyi bor bsam par bya/ /AH ni ngag gi lam la dgod/ /hUM ni snying

gar bsam bya zhing / /lte bar swA dang rkang gnyis hA/ /spyan dang mA ma kI dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni gos dkar mo/ /sgrol ma yang ni sngags pa yis/ /sa la sogs la rnam par dgod/ /lha mo rdo rje gzugs la sogs/ /de nyid la ni rnam bsams la/ /sa snying la sogs de

rnams dang / /snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom par bya/ /lag g.yas rdo rje ro langs ma/ /g.yon la gzhan gyi mi thub ma/ /de yi khar ni khro gnyer ma/ /gsang bar ral pa gcig ma'o/ /gzhan yang dpung pa g.yas par ni/ /de bzhin gshegs yum rdo rje ma/ /g.yon du sna tshogs

rin chen gyi/ /phyag rgya dag ni bsgom par bya/ /pus mo g.yas la gnas par yang / /sna tshogs pad+ma de bzhin gshegs/ /g.yon pa la ni sna tshogs las/ /spyi bor nam mkha'i rdo rje ma/ /rkang pa gnyis la sa yi ni/ /sa 'dzin lha mo gzhag par bya/ /de ltar 'dus byas

rnal 'byor pas/ /rdo rje pad+ma yang dag brtsam/ /hUM gi sngags skyes rdo rje ni/ /rtse mo mnga' ba bsam par bya/ /de tshe de yi rtse dbus su/ /oM ni rnam par bsam par bya/ /de bzhin a las byung ba yi/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ni/ /'od zer lnga yis khyab bsams la/ /de 'og sgrub pa

brtsam par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i nga rgyal legs 'chang ste/ /hUM gi glu yis kyang ni bskyod bya zhing / /rang gi byang chub sems nyid phyung ba'i tshe/ /des ni phaT kyi gsang sngags brjod par bya/ /phyung nas slar

yang sngags pas ni/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /byang chub sems kyis mchod nas ni/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA wa ko\u0f85haM/ rang sngags yi ge las dbyung ba/ /rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlabs bdag /

pad+ma'i dbus su bskyed nas ni/ /slar yang zhe sdang rdo rjer gyur/ /badzra d+h+r-ika sngags kyis dbyung ba/ /mi bskyod rdo rje bsam pa yang / /mgon po ral pa thor tshugs can/ /mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas/ /mthing shun bzang po'i mdog ltar snang / /sngo nag dkar dang dmar ba'i

zhal/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma ni/ /g.yas pa'i phyag tu bsam bya zhing / /dril bu rin chen ral gri ni/ /de yi g.yon la bsam par bya/ /'di ni thugs ka las byung nas/ /phyogs bcu rnams su gzigs

nas ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /sangs rgyas mdzad pa kun mdzad de/ /sems can ma lus kun sbyangs nas/ /zhe sdang rdo rje gnas la 'jog /slar byon rdo rje mgon po yi / /spyan snga ru ni 'dug par 'gyur / /sngags pas de yi snying ga ru/ /rjes zhugs bdag

nyid rnam bsgoms pas/ /snga ma'i gzugs ni yongs gyur nas/ /zhe sdang rdo rje gnas su zhugs/ /in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'bar ba/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs/ /dpa' bo rang gi phyag rgyas 'khyud/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /drag po zhi dang 'dod

chags che/ /zhal gsum gyis ni rnam par mdzes/ /zhe sdang rdo rje ting 'dzin gnas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad spro bar mdzad/ /dzi na dzikasngags kyis dbyung ba/ /gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad dbyung / /mi bskyod pa ni dbu rgyan byas/ /ston ka'i zla zer ltar snang zhing / /thor tshugs

cod pan dag gis brgyan/ /dkar dang nag dang dmar ba'i zhal/ /phyag drug zhi ba'i gzugs can te/ /'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma dag /g.yas pa la ni rnam par bsam/ /dril bu rin chen ral gri ni/ /'di yi g.yon du rnam par bsgom / /de bzhin thugs ka las byung ste/ /

gti mug spyod nas sems can rnams/ /yang dag sbyangs te slar byon nas/ /shar phyogs kyi ni zla bar bzhugs/ /rat+na d+h+r-ika sngags kyis dbyung ba/ /rin chen tog ni sngags pas dbyung / /zhi ba'i thor tshugs cod pan 'chang / /mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas/ / ser dang

gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal/ /phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom/ /yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje dang / /'khor lo de yi g.yas su bsgom/ /dril bu pad+ma ser po dang / /ral gri g.yon du bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin thugs ka nas byung ste/ /nga rgyal gnas la gnas pa rnams/ /

yang dag sbyangs nas lho yi char/ /rin chen dbus su bzhugs par gsungs/ /A ro l-ika sngags kyis dbyung ba/ /mtha' yas rdo rje can dbyung ste/ /zhi ba pad+ma rA ga'i 'od / /mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas/ /mgon po ral pa thor tshugs can/ /dmar dang gnag dang

dkar ba'i zhal/ /sgeg pa'i nyams dang yang dag ldan/ /phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom/ /g.yon pa'i phyag gis dril bu dang / /pad+ma sdong bu 'dzin par mdzad/ /pad+ma thugs ka'i phyogs gnas pa/ /g.yas pa yis ni 'byed par mdzad/ /rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas

gnyis la/ /rin chen ral gri g.yon gnyis la/ /sngon bzhin 'dod chags can sbyangs nas/ /rgyab kyi pad+ma la bzhugs 'gyur/ /pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika sngags kyis dbyung ba / /sngags pas don yod rdo rje can/ /mgon po sku mdog ljang gur dbyung / /mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas/ /

thor tshugs cod pan dag gis brgyan/ /ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal/ /phyag drug 'od zer rnam par 'phro/ /ral gri sna tshogs rdo rje dang / /'khor lo g.yas su bsgom par bya/ /phyag g.yon na ni dril bu dang / /de bzhin pad ljang nor bu'o/ /log pa'i ngang can sems

can rnams/ /rnam par sbyangs nas slar byon te/ /de bzhin byang gi phyogs su ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rje dag la bzhugs/ /zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags/ /yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ste/ /rigs ni lnga po 'di dag nyid/ /'dod dang thar par rab sgrub pa'o/

mo ha ra ti sngags kyis dbyung / /lha mo spyan ni dbyung bar bya/ /dkar zhing zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan/ /rnam snang mdzad kyis spyi bor mtshan/ /dkar dang gnag dang dmar ba'i zhal/ /phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom/ /'khor lo rdo rje de bzhin du/ /ut+pal dkar po g.yas su

bsam/ /dril bu de bzhin rin chen dang / /ral gri g.yon du bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin thugs ka nas byung ste/ /phyogs bcu dag tu gzigs nas ni/ /gdon dang nad gdungs 'jigs pa rnams/ /thugs rje chen pos zhi mdzad de/ /sA ra byon nas ni zla dkyil du/ /shar

gyi mtshams su bzhugs par gyur / /dwe Sha ra ti'i sngags kyis dbyung / /lha mo mA ma kI dbyung ste/ /ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ltar sngo/ /bzhin bzangs shin tu yid du 'ong / /gnag dang dkar dang dmar pa ste/ /mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas/ /'khor lo rdo rje de bzhin du/ /

ut+pal sngo dmar g.yas pa la/ /dril bu rin chen ral gri ni/ /g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad/ /bgegs chen 'jigs pas gzir ba rnams/ /thugs rje chen pos srung bar mdzad/ /byung nas slar ni byon nas su/ /lho nub tu ni bzhugs par gyur/ /rA ga ra ti'i sngags

kyis dbyung / /gos dkar mo ni dbyung bya ste/ /zhal ni dmar dang gnag dang dkar/ /pad+ma rA ga'i 'od dang ldan/ /'od dpag med bcas ral pa'i tshogs/ /phyag drug pa ni rnam bsgoms te/ /g.yon pa dril bur bcas pa yis/ /ut+pal sdong bu 'dzin mdzad la/ /thugs

kar gnas pa'i ut+pal/ /dmar po g.yas kyis 'byed par mdzad/ /rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas dag la/ /nor bu rin chen ral gri g.yon/ /bsnams par mdzad pa phyung nas ni/ /gdon gyis nyen pa zhes mdzad de/ /slar byon pad+ma'i dbus nyid du/ /nub byang mtshams su bzhugs par

'gyur/ /badzra ra ti'i sngags kyis dbyung / /yid 'ong sgrol ma dbyung bya ste/ /ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal/ /dUr ba'i lo ma'i mdangs dang ldan/ /don yod pas ni gtsug tor byas/ /phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo dang / /

ut+pal dkar po g.yas pa na/ /dril bu rin chen ral gri ni/ /brtul zhugs can gyis g.yon du bsam/ /sems can thams cad dbang mdzad de/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i gdan la yang / /byung nas slar ni byon nas su/ /byang shar mtshams su bzhugs par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor

pas ni rim gnyis par/ /gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa dbyung / /me yi mtshams su dgod bya ba/ /rdo rje gzugs ni yid 'ong ba/ /zhal gsum phyag drug dkar ba ste/ /dbu rgyan rnam par snang mdzad dpal/ /gnyis kyis me long 'dzin mdzad de/ /lhag ma gti mug dag

dang mtshungs/ /bden bral phyogs dgod lha mo ni/ /rdo rje sgra ste phyag drug ma / /zhal gsum sku mdog ser mo ste/ /dbu rgyan rin chen 'byung ldan yin/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni bi wang bsnams/ /lhag ma mA ma kI dang mtshungs/ /rlung gi phyogs dgod lha mo ni/ /rdo rje

dri ste phyag drug ma / /zhal gsum sku mdog dmar mo ste/ /snang mtha' yas kyi thor tshugs can/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni dung bsnams te/ /lhag ma gos dkar can dang mtshungs/ /dbang ldan phyogs dgod lha mo ni/ /rdo rje ro ste phyag drug ma / /zhal gsum sku mdog ljang

gu ste/ /dbu rgyan la ni [(]rda [,]rnga [)]sgra bzhugs/ /phyag gnyis la ni ro yi snod/ /lhag ma sgrol ma lta bu yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' legs 'khyud de/ /'khor lo'i dbus na rab bzhugs par/ /rdo rje reg bya bsam bya ste/ /zhal sogs bdag po lta bu'o/ /rim pa gsum pa

shar gyi ni/ /snam bur brtul zhugs can gyis dbyung / /maiM th+liM sa bon las byung ba/ /byams pa sa yi snying po gnyis/ /oM gyi sa bon las byung ba/ /phyag na rdo rje mkha' snying po/ /lho yi phyogs kyi snam bu la/ /go rims bzhin du dgod par bya/ /oM dang hUM las yang dag byung / /'jig rten

dbang po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /'di dag nub tu dbyung bar bya/ /byang gi phyogs su dbyung ba ni/ /oM dang saM ki sa bon skyes/ /sgrib sel kun du dbang por bcas/ /'di dag dbu rgyan rang gi mgon/ /sku mdog sogs pa de dang mtshungs/ /phyag dang mtshon cha dag kyang ni/ /rang rang gi ni bdag por mtshungs/ /

byams pa 'ba' zhig g.yas pa na/ /klu shing me tog bsnams par mdzad/ /'di dag skye mched rnam sbyangs shing / /lha yi mig sogs stsol ba po/ /sems can skye mched sbyangs nas su/ /slar byon nas ni stan la bzhugs/ /ya mAn+ta kr-ita sngags kyis ni/ /sngags pas gshin

rje gshed dbyung ba/ /rnam par snang mdzad dbu rgyan can/ /zhal ni gnag dang dkar dang dmar/ /'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rnam par 'khrigs/ /dbyug pa rdo rje 'khor lo rnams/ /phyag g.yas na ni bsnams par mdzad/ /thugs kar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /dril bu dgra sta

g.yon pa na/ /g.yon brkyang pa yi gnas pa yis/ / dbang po la sogs tshogs bcas dang / /mi bzad bgegs kyang skrag par mdzad/ /pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni/ /shar gyi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/ /pradz+nyA n+ta kr-ita sngags kyis ni/ /rin chen 'byung ldan dbu rgyan can/ /

sku mdog dkar zhing nor bus brgyan/ /gzhan gyis mi thub sngags kyis dbyung / /gsus khyim che zhing spyan gsum pa/ /dkar dang gnag dang dmar ba'i zhal/ /mche ba gtsigs shing rnam par 'gyur/ /'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rnam par 'khrigs/ /rdo rje dbyug pa ral gri

ni/ /g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad/ /snying gar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /dril bu dgra sta g.yon pa na/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis / /mi bzad bgegs ni skrag par mdzad/ /pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni/ /lho yi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/ /pad+mA n+ta

kr-ita sngags kyis ni/ /brtul zhugs can gyis rta mgrin dbyung / /spyan gsum pad+ma rA ga'i mdog /zhal ni dmar dang gnag dang dkar/ /zhal gdangs gsus khyim che ba dang / /'od dpag med pa'i cod pan can/ /dpa' bo g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas/ /'bar ba'i tshogs

ni rnam par 'khrugs/ /pad+ma ral gri gtun shing ni/ /g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad/ /bsnyems dang bcas pas dril bu dang / /dgra sta zhags pa g.yon na bsnams/ /pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te/ /phyogs bcu dag tu gzigs nas ni/ /klu rnams skrag par

mdzad nas su/ /nub kyi phyogs su bzhugs par 'gyur/ /big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita sngags kyis ni/ /rnga sgra'i cod pan yang dag ldan/ /ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ltar ljang / /bdud rtsi'i 'khyil pa dbyung bar bya/ /zhal ni sngo dang dmar dang dkar/ /zhal gdangs pa ni rnam par 'gyur/

gsus khyim che zhing spyan gsum pa/ /'bar ba'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo dang / /gtun shing rnams ni g.yas pa na/ /sdigs mdzub zhags par bcas pa dang / /dril bu dgra sta g.yon na bsnams/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis/ /

pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni/ /byang gi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/ /rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yis/ /mi g.yo ba yang dbyung bar bya/ /spyan gsum in+d+ra nI la'i mdog /dbu rgyan rnam par snang mdzad dpal/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /zhal ni gnag

dang dmar dang dkar/ /mi bzad ha ha zhes bzhad sgra/ /gsus khyim che zhing stobs po che/ /ral gri rdo rje 'khor lo rnams/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams par mdzad/ /sdigs mdzub dang ni dgra sta dang / /zhags pa g.yon pa'i phyag na bsnams/ /rims sogs 'jigs

pa'i gdon 'joms te/ /g.yon brkyang pa yi gnas pa yis/ /pad+ma nyi ma la gnas nas/ /shar lho mtshams su bzhugs par gyur/ /rang gis nags kyis bskyed pa yi / /brtul zhugs can gyis 'dod rgyal dbyung / /drag po in+d+ra nA la'i mdog /rin chen 'byung ldan

dbu rgyan can/ /zhal ni gnag dang dmar dang dkar/ /spyan gsum mche ba 'jigs su rung / /phyag gnyis rdo rje hUM mdzad kyang / /phyag rgya dag ni 'ching bar mdzad/ /rdo rje ral gri g.yas dag na/ /g.yon na zhags pa lcags kyu'o/ /bden bral bgegs ni 'joms pa'o/ /g.yon

brkyang gnas pas nyi mar bzhugs/ /rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yi / /brtul zhugs can gyis dbyug sngon bskyed/ /spyan gsum sprin sngon lta bu ste/ /'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /zhal ni sngo dang dkar dang dmar/ /gsus khyim che zhing

'jigs par mdzad/ /dbyug pa ral gri 'khor lo ni/ /g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad/ /snying gar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /dgra sta rnams ni g.yon na bsnams/ /yams kyi 'jigs pa bsal nas ni/ /gtum po g.yon brkyang gnas pa yis/ /pad+ma

nyi ma la gnas te/ /nub byang mtshams su bzhugs par gyur / /rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yi / /rnga sgra yis ni dbu rgyan can/ /stobs po che ni sngags pas dbyung / /ut+pal sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba/ /zhal ni gnag dang dmar dang dkar/ /spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i

sgra dang ldan/ /yan lag thams cad sprul gyis brgyan/ /gsus khyim che zhing 'jigs par byed/ /dbyug pa ral gri 'khor lo ni/ /g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad/ /snying gar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /dgra sta rnams ni g.yon na bsnams/ /g.yon

brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis/ /mkha' 'gro la sogs 'jigs pa 'joms/ /pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te/ /byang shar mtshams su bzhugs par gyur/ /rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yi/ /gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dbyung / /mkha' ltar sngo bsangs 'jigs pa po/ /

mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas/ /zhal ni sngo dang dmar dang dkar/ /gtso bo spyan gsum gsus pa 'phyang / /g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi phyag gnyis kyis/ /spyi bor gtsug tor 'dzin par mdzad/ /rdo rje pad+ma g.yas dag na/ /sdigs mdzub ral gri g.yon na bsnams/ /

'tshe ba thams cad rnam 'jigs can / /gtum po g.yon brkyang gnas pa yis/ /pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te/ /tshangs pa'i gnas su de bzhugs pa'o/ /rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yi/ /brtul zhugs can gyis gnod mdzes dbyung / /spyan gsum nam mkha' lta bu'i mdog /

zhal ni gang dang dmar dang dkar/ /gsus khyim che zhing 'jigs pa'i zhal/ /mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen ni/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na 'dzin par mdzad/ /snying gar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /pad+ma ral gri g.yon na bsnams/ /rgyu ba

dang ni gnas pa'i dug /ka la ku ta sogs kun dang / /bgegs kyi bdag po kun bcom ste/ /thams cad zhi bar mdzad nas ni/ /ma lus bka' ni rdzogs byas la/ /g.yon brkyang pa yi gnas pa yis/ /pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te/ /sa yi 'og tu de bzhugs so/ /lha

ni sum cu gnyis rang bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bskyed nas ni/ /'khor lo'i dbus su gnas gyur na/ /de nas phra mo'i rnal 'byor brtsam/ /sna yi rtse mor yungs kar bsam/ /'gro dang mi 'gro yungs kar la/ /gsang ba'i sngags kyis brtags pa yi/ /

ye shes mchog gi gnas bsgom mo/ /rin chen kha dog sna lnga la/ /yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam/ /sna yi rtse mor nan tan du/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom/ /rin chen brtan par gyur nas spro/ /brtan par ma gyur de mi spro/ /sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od mnyam pa/ /

rab mchog sprin ni spro bar bya/ /slong mo za zhing mi bzlas te/ /ma bslangs pa la'ang chags mi bya/ /'dod pa kun las longs spyod cing / /sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas / /brjod nas rdo rje spro ba ni/ /rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /

don dam pa yi bzlas par bshad/ /phra mo'i rnal 'byor bzlas pa yang / /ci 'dod par ni rnam gnyis bya/ /slar yang sngags pas bdag nyid ni/ /de bzhin nyid la gzhug par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gnas pa 'di/ /lha mos bdag po ma mthong bas/ /tshigs su bcad pa

'di bzhi yis/ /bde ba chen po skul bar byed/ /sems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs/ /dga' ba yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab tu gsol/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /sems can yab chen gnyen

mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /rdo rje sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan/ /sangs rgyas don du byang chub mchog bsgrub rab tu phan par gzigs/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /

'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /khyod ni rdo rje gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba/ /'jig rten dag gi dgos pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /spyod

pa dri med kun du bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs te dam tshig mchog gi phan don che/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs pa/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /yon tan rin chen

mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /de ltar yang dag yon tan ni/ /brjod pas mgon po de bskul nas/ /mi bskyod la sogs ngo bo yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bstod par mdzad/ /mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po/ /rdo rje

gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/ /gsang ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par snang mdzad rab tu dag /rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog /ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma

med/ /dngos nyid dag pa gos med pa/ /gsang ba'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mi 'chi 'dod chags che/ /mi rtog nam mkha'i rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes/ /rdo rje gsungs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje dga' ba gdon mi za/ /bsam pa thams cad

yongs rdzogs pa/ /sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid las byung / /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'khor lo sangs rgyas kyis bstod gsol/ /mchog tu gsang ba ji bzhin don spyad nas/ /rang gi 'khor lo la ni 'khor lo gzhug /mgon po bde ba chen po gcig po bzhugs/

de ltar rnal 'byor bzhi byed rnal 'byor pa/ /hUM gi snying pos 'jig rten rab tu bsgom/ /de byung 'gro kun rdo rje sems dpar bsam/ /langs nas 'gro la bltas te ji bzhin spyad par bya/ /sngags pas ting 'dzin dmigs pa'i tshe/ /gang tshe lus ni bskams gyur na/ /lus ngag

yid ni tshim byed pa'i/ /sbyor ba 'di ni bsgom par bya/ /mtho gang tsam gyis dpags pa ru/ /spyi bor dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni nges 'bebs pa'i/ /oM ni de ru bas mkhar bya/ /rdo rje sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /skad cig gis ni gzi can 'gyur/ /lus

ngag yid ni bde ba dag /thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de ltar slob pa'i sngags pa yis/ /sbyangs dang de bzhin rtogs par bya/ /lkog ma snying ga legs sbyangs shing / /de bzhin gshegs rnams tshim par bya/ /hUM gis legs par sbyangs byas la/ /yi ge AH yis

rtogs byas te/ /oM gyis mnan nas sbar bar bya/ /'di ni kha zas sbyang bya ba'o/ /dang po mgrin pa'i mtshams bsam pa/ /der ni hrIH las byung ba yi/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsgom/ /lte ba'i nang du yi ge hUM/ /hUM las skyes pa'i rdo rje che / /rtse mo lnga pa rnam par bsam/ /

rtse mo dbus ma'i steng du ni/ /oM bsam lkog ma sbyang ba'o/ /sprin gyi sgra ni snying gar bsam/ /rtse gsum me ni de la spro/ /der ni bza' ba bsreg pa dag /'di ni nang gi sbyin sreg yin/ /rlung gis me ni sbar byed pa/ /der ni tshu gang 'tshed par byed/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor gnas su ni/ /

gang du me ni rgyu ba dag /bza' ba dang ni btung ba rnams/ /gang ci rung ba chu'i dkyil 'khor/ /bza' ba kha yi pad+ma las/ /snying ga'i pad+mar yang dag gzhug /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor phyin 'og tu/ /kha sbyar ba yi sbyor ba yis / /gsang ba'i pad+ma las byung ba/ /thal pa'i mthar ni

rnam par brtag /rims nad med cing nad kyang med/ /dug la sogs pas mi 'chi la/ /de ni dus min 'chi mi 'gyur/ /'tshe ba thams cad rnam 'joms pa'o/ /rdo rje phreng ba dpal mchog srub shing gis/ /gsang 'dus sbas chu'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa las/ /sgrub pa'i yan

lag bdud rtsi gang thob des/ /'jig rten ma lus 'chi med myur thob shog /sgrub pa'i thabs mdor byas pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen

bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza ma hA yo ga tan+d+ra ut+pAd kra ma sA d+ha na sU tra me shra ba ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa

bsgom pa'i thabs mdo dang bsres pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i sgrub pa la rab tu 'jug pa rnams kyis bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin nges par bya ba'i

phyir mdo dang bsres pa zhes bya ba le'u bcu bdun pa las btus te bsdu bar bya'o/ /de la sgrub pa pos ji skad du le'u bcu gnyis pa las/ dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs ni/ /me tog 'bras bu sogs pas brgyan/ /ri bo dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa

'grub/ /ces bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig gi tshul gyis rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug ste/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de le'u gsum pa las/ nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil

'khor bsgom pa ni/ /'od zer sprin gyi tshogs chen po/ /sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan/ /'od zer sna lngas kun du khyab/ /kun nas yongs su zlum po ste/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis brgyan/ /mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa/ /mdor na de ltar bsgoms nas su/ /

gzugs ni dbus su bsgom par bya/ /zhes mdor bsdus te gsungs pa de la dang po kho nar byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i gzugs can zhes bya ba bskyed par bya ba ste/ le'u bco lnga pa las/ rnam par snang mdzad 'od 'dra zhing / /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje

gsum 'dzin 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pa 'dis rdo rje 'chang chen po sku mdog dkar por bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin mos par bya'o/ /de nas le'u dang po las/ ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa'i tshul gyis mi bskyod pa bskyed pas zhe sdang rdo rjer gyur nas le'u

bcu gsum pa las/ khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes/ /gsod la rtag tu brtson pa dag /sgrub pa mchog gi chos can la/ /gsod pa'i don gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pas yi ge hUM ring po las khro bo'i rgyal po bcu phyung la le'u bcu bzhi pa las/ oM sum+b+ha

zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis khro bo'i rgyal po gnod mdzes la bka' bsgo bas phyogs bcu'i bgegs kyi tshogs bkug nas le'u bcu gsum pa las/ yi dam bcas pa rdzogs nas kyang / /sngags kyi gnas ni bsrung bar bya/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di

la ni/ /gnas nas sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal chen po/ /rdo rje phur bu rnam par bsgom/ /me stag 'bar ba 'dra ba yis/ /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor gdab par bya/ /zhes gsungs pa 'dis khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phur bu rnams kyis oM g+ha g+ha zhes bya ba

la sogs pa'i sngags kyis gnod mdzes la bka' bsgo ste phur bu gdab bo/ /de nas 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i sngags kyis rdo rje rab bsam pa dang / hUM mdzad kyis rdo rje'i dra ba yi ge hUM gis sa'i cha rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bsam zhing yi ge gsum gyis go cha la sogs pa bya'o/ /de ltar phyogs dang

mtshams bcing ba dang rab la sogs pa'i chog srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgoms la le'u gnyis pa las/ dngos po med pa sgom pa'i dngos/ /bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min/ /de ltar dngos po dngos med pa/ /bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o/ /zhes tshigs su bcad pa'i don gyis

stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du bsgom mo/ /de nas le'u bcu gcig pa las/ dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun las skyes/ /nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsgom / /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas/ rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bskyed nas/ bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu bya/ /zhes bya

ba la sogs pas sa'i cha bskyed la le'u bcu gcig pa las/ yi ge b+hUM gyis gnas bsgom ste/ /zhes bya bas gzhal yas khang bsams la/ der le'u dang po las/ gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /

zhes gsungs pa 'dis sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba la sogs pa'i gdan gyis brgyan la le'u brgyad pa las/ dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam la/ /gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa yi / /mchod rten rin chen sna bzhi pa/ /gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med/ /ces bya ba la sogs pa

gsungs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom mo/ /gnas ni bskyed pa sngon 'gro bas/ /rdo rje gsum bskyed bsgom par bya/ /zhes gsungs pas lhag par mos pa can gyi sems kyis bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang nyid du gyur nas/ dbus

kyi gdan la sems pa'i skyil mo krung gis gnas par bsams nas le'u dang po las/ gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun du khyab/ /sangs rgyas tshogs kyis rab tu rgyas/ /'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug /ces gsungs pa 'dis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo

bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang du byas te lhag par mos pa la dmigs par stan pa yin no/ /da ni rnal 'byor bzhi'i rim pa brtsam par bya ste de la le'u bdun pa las/ dam tshig khu phyung cho ga bzhin/ /'bras bu 'dod pas btung bar bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad nas/ /

dngos grub rab mchog thob par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pa 'dis lhag par mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bkod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phung po la sogs par bsdus te/ gzugs phung gtogs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor

du zhugs la/ le'u gsum pa las/ oM shU n+ya tA zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /le'u brgyad pa las/ nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya/ /zhes gsungs pa 'dis ye shes rgya mtsho'i gzugs su

yongs su gyur nas/ de nas ldang bar gyur pa ni ye shes rgya mtsho las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang de'i steng du pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa pad+ma'i steng du yi ge gsum bkod de/ de thams cad bsdus te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra bar yongs su gyur par

bltas la/ de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi 'phro 'du bskyed nas sems can gyi khams rnams ye shes kyi bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du rjes su bcug la le'u gsum pa las/ oM d+harma d+hA tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis brtan par bya ba 'di ni rnal

'byor te/ de bas na/ ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa/ /rnal 'byor yin par shes par bya/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /de la le'u bcu gcig pa las/ rdo rje mchog gsum yi ge sngags/ /phyag rgya chen por rnam bsgom pa/ /byang chub thams cad thob bya'i phyir/ /ye

shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge gsum bkod la rdo rje nga rgyal de las byung ba/ /rdo rje 'chang chen por bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin bsgom pa ni rjes su rnal 'byor ro/ /de nas le'u dang po las gsungs pa'i rig pa'i

skyes bu gzugs can ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis sems can gyi don bya bar mi nus pas na le'u brgyad pa las/ nu ma'i bar nas klad pa'i rgya bar du/ /chog shes pas rkang mthil bar du dgod/ /lte ba rked pa gsang bar rgyal ba'i sras/ /rigs lnga rnams ni dgod

par rab tu bya/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pas phung po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ye shes kyi rang bzhin lus la rjes su zhugs par bya'o/ /de bas na le'u bcu bdun pa las/ phung po lnga ni mdor

bsdus na/ /sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu bsgrags/ /rdo rje skye mched nyid dag kyang / /byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog /ces gsungs pa yin no/ /da ni sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la rjes su zhugs pas zhal gsum lta bus gdul bya rnams kyi don du rdo rje 'chang gi bdag

nyid du bsgom par bya'o/ /don 'di nyid bstan pa ni le'u dang po las/ rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs so/ /byin gyis brlabs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi

sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsum pa lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur te zhes gsungs pa ni shin tu rnal 'byor ro/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rjes su zhugs pas sku la sogs pa'i rim

pa 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de la rim pa ni 'di yin te le'u bcu gcig pa las/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /hUM zhes bya ba rab tu bsgom/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /yi ge oM ni rnam par bsam/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus

gnas par/ /yi ge AH zhes rnam par bsam/ /zhes gsungs pa 'dis mgo bo dang lkog ma dang snying ga'i phyogs su yi ge gsum rnam par bkod la/ de las byung ba'i spyan la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis sku rdo rje la sogs pa bkug la le'u bcu gnyis pa las/ sangs rgyas

sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab la rjes su zhugs nas le'u bdun pa las/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis rigs gsum gyi bdag nyid

can du nga rgyal bskyed la le'u drug pa las/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab bo/ /le'u dang po las/ rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa'i tshul gyis bskyed pa ni dam tshig sems

dpa' zhes bya'o/ /de nas le'u bcu gnyis pa las/ rnam pa mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i/ /snying gar ye shes dam tshig dang / /dbu rgyan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mchog /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes 'gyur ba/ /'di ni dam tshig mchog yin te/ /dngos grub thams

cad 'grub pa'i mchog /dam tshig mchog gis rab tu bya/ /zhes gsungs pa 'dis dam tshig sems dpa'i snying gar ye shes sems dpa' sa bon gyis dgug pa dang / dbu rgyan la rang gi bdag po bsgom mo/ /de nas le'u bcu gcig pa las/ snying gar yi ge hUM bsams

nas/ /sems ni thig ler gyur par gzhag /ces gsungs pa 'dis ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar yang snying po yi ge hUM ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' bsgom mo/ /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi go 'phang ni 'dod chags las skye bar 'gyur bar rab tu

bstan pa'i phyir/ le'u dang po las/ 'dod chags chen po'i tshul rdo rje/ /zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad pa de bzhin du bskyed bzhin pa la gnas pas dang po'i sbyor ba bya ste/ 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'dod pas thar pa

rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ le'u bcu bdun pa las/ 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pa'i/ /zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes gsungs pa'i rim pa 'dis le'u bco lnga pa las gsungs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i gdol pa'i bu mo legs par bslabs pa'am/

lang na rang gi snying ga nas phyungs te mdun du bzhag la le'u brgyad pa las/ nu ma'i bar nas klad pa'i rgyas kyi bar/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas rigs lnga dang bsre ba byas la rdo rje dang pad+ma mngon par 'dus byas pas dbang po gnyis kyis snyoms par 'jug pa bya ste/

le'u bdun pa las ji skad du/ bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba/ /lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la/ /byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas gsum gyis/ /dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i mchog /spyan la sogs pa bsgom par bya/ /

dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /oM zhes pa dang AHzhes pas/ /hUM dang phaT du rnam par brtag /'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yi/ /pad+ma rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /zhes gsungs pa 'dis tha ma la pa'i nga rgyal spangs la/ chags shing

chags pa'i lta bas blta / /'di ni dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro/ /zhes bya ba 'dis thabs kyi rdo rjes mnyes par bya zhing / rin chen 'byung ldan gyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas le'u drug pa las gsungs pa'i rjes su chags pa'i sngags brjod la 'khyud pa dpa'o bya

ba dang / gzhib pa la sogs pa byas la yi ge hUM gi glu len cing las la gnas par bsgom mo/ /'byin pa'i skabs su phaT ces brjod la/ byang chub kyi sems kyi rdul phra rab de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i 'byung gnas su bsgoms la sngar bshad pa'i

gzhal yas khang na gnas par bya'o/ /de nas don yod pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas le'u drug pa las gsungs pa'i mchod pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs te gzhung 'di dag gis ni dkyil 'khor gsum sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can te/ bdag gi don phun sum

tshogs pa dang po'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir le'u dang po las gsungs pa'i ye shes sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsangs pa'i tshul gyis mi bskyod pa phyung la des zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can rnams yang dag

par sbyangs la de bkug nas rang gi lus la bcug na zhe sdang rdo rjer 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams phyung nas/ de rnams kyis gti mug la sogs pa la rjes su dga' ba'i sems can rnams yang dag par sbyangs nas bsdus

te/ ye shes kyi 'khor lor rjes su bcug la slar bkug ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod nas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa'o/ /de nas le'u gsum pa las/ rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa/ /yungs kar gyi ni

'bru tshod tsam/ /sna yi rtse mor nan tan du/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa phra mo'i sbyor ba'o/ /le'u bdun pa las/ slong mo za zhing mi bzlas te/ /ma bslangs pa la chags mi bya/ /'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing / /sngags kyi yan

lag ma nyams bzlas/ /zhes gsungs pa la sogs pas rdo rje'i bzlas pa dran par bya ste/ le'u bcu gsum pa las/ brjod nas rdo rje spro ba ni/ /rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya/ /zhes bya ba dag gi bzlas brjod byas la nye bar bsdu par bya ste/ le'u bcu bdun pa las/ de

nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la dga' bas bstod pa zhes bya ba 'di thams cad

bya ste/ bdag po rang nyid don dam pa'i bden pa la zhugs la/ de nas spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis rab tu bskul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis/ mi bskyod pa ni ye shes che/ /zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod pas yang

dag par sad par bya ste/ cho ga bzhin legs par mchod nas rang gi sku la legs par gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas le'u bcu pa las/ nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus gnas yi ge hUM/ /rang gi gzugs

su rab tu brtag /rdo rje 'od zer rab tu 'bar/ /rnam par 'phro bar bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gsung thugs/ /snying la de yis rnam bsgoms na / /de ma thag tu de 'gyur ba/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin/ /zhes gsungs pa 'dis yi ge hUM gis nam mkha'i khams

yongs su gang ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du rnam par bsams la nye bar bsdu bar bya'o/ /de ltar las dang po pa rnams rab tu 'jug pa'i dam tshig dang sdom pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pas tha mal pa'i nga rgyal dang bral bas thun bzhir lha'i rnal 'byor la goms pas bdag

dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub pa'i phyir las kyi rab tu dbye ba rnams kyang bya'o/ /rim pa 'di nyid kyis le'u bcu bdun pa las/ lus kyi rdo rje kha zas dang / /phyi rol rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / /rdo rje chos la rtag par ni/ /sngags bton cho ga spyad par bya/ /zhes gsungs pa'i

ting nge 'dzin 'dis sgrub pa'i thabs las bshad pa'i rim pas kha zas sbyang ba dang / lkog ma sbyang ba dang / snying ga sbyang ba dag byas nas bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i zas kyi bya ba dag kyang bya'o/ /de nas le'u bcu pa las/ sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa/ /rdo rje

gsum gyi ye shes rdzogs/ /dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis/ /dngos po thams cad brtag par bya/ /zhes gsungs pa 'dis rdo rje dang pad+ma yang dag par sbyar bas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad rab tu bsgrub pa'i yi ge gsum gyi sngags dang / phreng ba'i sngags dang /

gsang sngags dang / sman dang / nang gi sbyin sreg gis kyang las thams cad rab tu bsgrub par bya ste/ 'di ni las kyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa'o/ /de ltar mdo dang bsres pa rgyas par bstan nas/ da ni mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya ste/ de la thog mar gnas

nges pa dang / snying rje chen po la dmigs pa dang / srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa dang / stong pa nyid la dmigs pa dang / sa'i cha bskyed pa dang / gzhal yas khang dang / dkyil 'khor dgod pa dang / don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang / ldang ba dang / nyi ma'i dkyil

'khor la dmigs pa dang / mthar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po bskyed pa dang / sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs pas phung po la sogs pa dgang ba dang / sku gsung thugs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang ldan pa'i 'dus byas pa dang / rdo rje dang pad+ma 'dus byas pa

dang / rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dkyil 'khor phyung ba dang / phra mo'i sbyor ba dang / rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang / ngag gi bzlas pa dang / don dam pa la zhugs pa dang / rab tu bskul bas bslang pa dang / bstod pa byed pa dang / nye bar bsdu ba dang / las

kyi rab tu dbye ba rnams su shes par bya'o/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bskyed rim gyi sgrub pa'i thabs mdo dang bsres pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang lo tsA ba dge slong

rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza maN+Dal bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thog

ma dbus mtha' las grol ba'i/ /khyab bdag stong pa bzhi'i rang bzhin/ /mgon po rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /btud nas dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /ji srid phreng ba chu la sogs/ /de srid bla ma'i man ngag mtha'/ /dbang bskur ba ni cho ga

bzhin/ /bla ma'i brgyud rim las 'ongs pa / /rnal 'byor rnam gnyis mthar thug pa'i/ /bla ma'i lung ni nges thob pa/ /bshad rgyud bzhi yi dgongs pa zhes/ /bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs pa yi/ /rim pa gnyis kyi don shes dang / /mchog dang thun mongs sgrub la gnas/ /dam

tshig sdom la gnas pa ste/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba spongs dang ldan/ /bzod ldan drang la g.yo sgyu med/ /brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes/ /de nyid bcu ni yongs shes shing / /dkyil 'khor 'dri dang rab gnas mkhas/ /nyan thos rnams kyi lam 'gro min/ /

pha rol phyin bcu'i tshul la gnas/ /zab cing rgya che'i chos la mos/ /bden gnyis la ni rnam par mkhas/ /bla med theg pa gtsor byed pa/ /'gro ba'i don spyod snying rje can/ /rin chen skyes bur gang gyur pas/ /sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas su/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /gang

zhig yid 'ong gnas su ni/ /dri bzang tsan+dan sogs kyis byug /dri zhim me tog mchog bkram nas/ /shar phyogs su ni kha bltas la/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gnas te/ /'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba yis / /'gro la phan dang bskyab pa'i phyir/ /snying rje chen pos dmigs

par bya/ /bka' yi 'khor lo sngon 'gro ba'i/ /bsnyen dang nyer sgrub sgrub pa dang / /sgrub chen la ni mkhas pa yis/ /sbyor ba gsum gyi mthar thug pas/ /rdo rje bzlas dang rjes mthun par/ /ngag gi bzlas pa'i tshul nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo'i 'bum du bzlas/ /

de las gzhan pa'i khri ru bzlas/ /mtshan ma nges par thob pa'am/ /yang na bsnyen pa'i sbyor goms pas/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su bri bar bya/ /de la dkyil 'khor cho ga ni/ /yan lag rnam phye nyi shu ste/ /sa gzhi sbyang dang byin brlab dang / /

yongs su gzung dang bsrung ba dang / /sa yi lha dang dkyil 'khor dang / /bum pa rnams dang slob ma dag /sta gon du ni gnas pa dang / /thig gdab pa yi cho ga dang / /de bzhin rdul tshon dgye ba dang / /dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa dang / /de la mchod pa'i bye

drag dang / /slob dpon bdag nyid 'jug pa dang / /de bzhin slob ma gzhug pa dang / /bum pa'i dbang dang gsang ba dang / /shes rab ye shes dbang dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni bzhi pa dang / /rab gnas dang ni sbyin sreg te/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni yan lag mchog /'di dag

cho ga nyi shu'o// //de la re zhig dang por dkyil 'khor bri bar mngon par 'dod pa'i sa'i cha'i dbus su maN+Dal gru bzhi khru gdab ba bya ste/ me tog sil ma bkram la lha'i gnas dang gdan ji lta ba bzhin bsams te / bla ma dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams rdzogs par

bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang mnyes par byas te/ byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i mthar thug pa bya zhing / de la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod de / bstod pa tshul bzhin byas la/ dgongs shig dus gsum

mgon po rnams/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa dang / /slob ma rnams la sman slad du/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar 'tshal/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab tu

gsol/ /lan gsum brjod de gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas phyogs skyong rnams rang rang gi gnas su ji lta ba bzhin bskyed la dzaH hUM baM hoH/ phyag rgya bzhis dgug pa la sogs pa tshul bzhin du byas te/ mchod yon dang / zhal bsil dang / zhabs bsil dang / spos

dang / me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa lngas mchod de/ kha zas sbyar ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis gtor ma byin gyis brlabs te / oM in+d+rA ya swA hA/ oM ya mA ya swA hA/ oM ba ru NA ya swA hA/ oM ku be rA ya swA hA/ oM ag+na ye swA hA/ oM nai r-i t+ya rAk+Sha sa rAk+ShA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ oM

bA ya be swa hA/ oM I shA nA ya swA hA/ oM sUr+yA ya swA hA/ oM tsan+d+ra di ta ya swA hA/ oM pr-i thi bye swA hA/ zhes pas gtor ma dbul lo/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Ad+ya nut+pa n+na ma twA ta oM AH hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes lan gsum bzlas pas mnyes par bya ste/ khams gsum gnas pa'i lha

dang klu/ /gnod sbyin dri za lha ma yin/ /gang dag rdzu 'phrul cher ldan rnams/ /rdo rje'i spyan dang snyan mda' ba/ /sa la gnas pa'i 'byung po kun/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang / /sems can rnams la phan don du/ /sa phyogs dge

gnas 'di nyid du/ /dam pa'i dkyil 'khor cher 'byung ba/ /ji ltar bsams pa'i las byed na/ /khyod kyis bar chad ma byed par/ /dge ba'i grogs po nyid du mdzod/ /de ltar khyed la bdag gis ni/ /bzod pa gsol gyis mi slu bar/ /rmi lam la sogs mtshan ma rnams/ /

nyes legs ltas rnams bstan du gsol/ /zhes lan gsum brjod la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas lcogs na las thams cad pa'i thab khung der dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas mi rus kyi phye ma las gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyis

bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin sreg bya'o/ /mi lcogs na las thams cad pa'i sngags kyi chus bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya'o/ /de nas ji ltar sa brtags pa'i dbus su las thams cad par byin gyis brlabs pa'i las kyi rdo rjes g.yas skor du khru gang zabs su brko/

zhog ma dang sol dum dang rus pa dang so phag la sogs pa'i skyon bsal la/ sman lnga dang rin po che lnga dang 'bru lnga blugs la dri zhim zhing snum pa'i sas bkang la gru bzhi lham par sa gzhi 'thas par byas la ba ko tsam du ba'i lci bas la ma lhung bas byug go/ /dri zhim po'i

chus kyang byugs te/ me tog sil ma dgram pa ni phyi'i sbyang ba'o/ /de'i steng du sbyor ba gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par bsgoms pa'i mthar gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyis bgegs bkrad pa ni nang gi sbyang ba'o/ / 'di dag ni sa sbyang ba'i cho ga'o/ /de

nas hUM khaM hUM/ zhes pas rnam par dag pa'i nam mkha' bsams nas/ de nas hUM suM hUM/ zhes pas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i rin po che sna bzhi'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab bskyed la/ de'i steng du hUM laM hUM/ zhes pas gser gyi sa gzhi gru bzhi pa la rdo rje phreng bas brgyan par bsam

mo/ /de'i steng du rdo rje thal mo bcings pas kha sbubs la/ oM badzra me di nI badzra'i b+ha ba ban+d+ha hUM/ zhes pas de dag byin gyis brlab po/ /de nas sbyor ba gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa 'di ni sa gzhi byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas yang bdag nyid dang po'i sbyor

bas zhe sdang rdo rjer bsgoms la/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi phyogs bzhi na gnas pa'i las kyi rdo rje bzhi dngos su'am sems kyis bsams kyang rung ste/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar gsol ba gdab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa

kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan min thams cad rnam spangs pa/ kun du bzang po sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa

bshad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung / /ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba/ /kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/ /kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo bsgyur /

dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /de ltar lan gsum du gsol ba btab nas/ bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje khro bo chen por bsgoms te/ mig g.yas g.yon du ma dang Ta las nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms te/ de'i dbus su mig 'bras hUM las gyur pa'i rdo rje nag po de las

khro bo'i 'od zer gyi snang ba phyogs bcur 'phros pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyis khyab par sprul par bya'o/ /rkang pa gnyis la a las sna tshogs rdo rje 'od 'bar ba bsgoms la lag pa g.yas g.yon du rdo rje dang dril bu 'gying bag can du 'dzin pas

dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams te/ stang stabs kyis g.yas skor du dkyil 'khor gyis la lan gsum bskor bar bya'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod cing bskor ro/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson/ /bdag ni dpal

ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor gyis/ /lha dang lha dbang gsang ba pa/ /brjed byed la sogs bgegs kyi tshogs/ /sa 'dir ma gnas gzhan du dengs/ /gal te dam tshig las 'das na/ /rdo rje khro bo bzhin 'bar ba'i/ /rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /mgo

ni tshal pa brgyar gsheg cing / /zhig par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /zhes brjod nas sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab bo/ /de nas seng ldeng gi phur pa dri dmar pos byugs shing srad bu dmar po dang me tog gi phreng ba btags pa stod zhal gsum phyag drug pa smad zur gsum

rtse gcig par byin gyis brlabs pa'am/ yang na bka'i 'khor lo'i sbyor bas phur bu gdab par bya'o/ /'di dag ni sa yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o// //de nas gnod mdzes dang 'dod pa'i rgyal pos ra ba dang dra bas phyogs bsrung zhing bcing bar bya'o/ /'di dag ni sa bsrung ba'i cho

ga'o// //de nas mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgyas gnon du byas pas dkyil 'khor gyi sa la bzhag ste/ oM Tak+ki hUM dzaH/ zhes brjod pas sa'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad kyis mtshan pa/ lag pa na gser gyi bum pa 'dzin pa/ dkyil

'khor gyi sa'i dbus nas 'thon bar bsams te/ de la 'di skad du/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis / /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang / /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag

gis bdud kyi sde/ /pham par byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ /zhes lan gsum du gsol ba gdab po/ /de nas mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang mchod pa phul te bzod par gsol te de nyid du thim par bsam mo/ /de dag ni sa'i lha mo sta gon

du gnas pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas bdud rtsi lnga dang dri zhim po'i chus lha'i grangs dang mthun pa'i rigs so so'i thig le byas la/ gdan dang gzhal yas khang ji lta ba bzhin bsams la/ phyag rgya dang gnyis su med pa'i khyad par las dam tshig gi 'khor lo

rdzogs par bkod la/ ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byas te/ ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis brlab pa byas la/ phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi mchod pas mchod cing bstod pa byas te gsol ba lan gsum du gdab par bya'o/ /lag

pas bdug spos blangs nas pus mo sa la btsugs te 'di skad du/ bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog /rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje bdag nyid can dag gi /dkyil 'khor bdag nyid bri bar 'tshal/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang / /khyed rnams la

yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de ni gnang bar mdzad pa'i rigs/ /sangs rgyas 'gro 'khor bya don stsol / /byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang / /gzhan yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang / /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang / /gang yang

'byung po mthu chen dang / /gang yang rdo rje spyan mnga' ba'i/ /sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /yo byad ci 'byor bas 'dri na/ /deng bdag slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs ni brtse bar dgongs nas su/ /

tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/ /de ltar lan gsum du gsol ba btab la mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas rab dang dra bas phyogs dang phyogs mtshams bcing ba byas te/ 'di dag ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha sta gon du gnas pa'i cho ga'o// //

de nas gser la sogs pa'am/ sa'i khams kyi rgyu las byas pa'i bum pa lto ba che ba mgrin pa ring ba kha khyer dang ldan zhing mchu 'phyang ba nag nog med pa lha'i grangs dang mthun par byas te/ tsan+dan dkar pos byugs shing pad+ma la sogs pa'i gdan la so so rang rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa

bri/ ras kha tshar ma nyams pas mgul pa bcings la tsu ta la sogs pa'i 'bras bu can gyi shing gis kha brgyan pa sngags kyis btab ba'i dri zhim po'i chus gang ba/ gro dang nas dang til dang 'bras so ba dang mon sran dre'u ste 'bru lnga dang / byu ru dang sa le sbram dang dung dang mu tig

dang nor bu ste rin po che lnga dang / siM hi dang / byA grI dang / ha sa dang / ha sa de ba dang / kar+Ni ka ste sman lnga blugs la/ me tog gi phreng bas bcings pa'i rdo rje khar bzhag ste dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas la bzlas pa bya/ yi ge baM las gyur pa'i gser gyi bum pa

bsgoms la/ hrIH las gyur pa'i pad+ma dang / oM dang AH las gyur pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan la rang rang gi sa bon yongs su gyur pa las sku rdzogs pa la ye shes kyi 'khor lo bkug la bstim par bya ste/ mchod yon dang / mchod pa lnga phul la/ gtor ma yang kha zas sbyang ba'i ting

nge 'dzin du byas la thun mtshams bzhi ru phul nas so so'i bzlas pas mnyes par bya'o/ /de yang g.yas su rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa bzhag ste mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin du bya'o/ /g.yon du las thams cad pa'i bum pa bzhag la mchod pa dang bzlas pas mnyes par byas nas/ dkyil

'khor gyi bgegs bsal du gsol zhes phrin las bcol lo/ /dkyil 'khor la mchod pa yang bya ste snga ma bzhin du gsol ba gdab pa yang lan gsum du bya'o/ /'di dag ni bum pa sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas phyi rol du byung nas rang gi slob ma brtags la gzung bar

bya ste/ blo dang ldan pa theg pa chen po la dga' ba bla ma la dad cing snying rje che ba/ bka' drin rjes su dran pa nga rgyal med pa bslab pa yid ches pa dang ldan pa/ gsang sngags bsgrub pa dang / slob dpon la lhag par mos pa rigs dang ldan zhing sdom pa dang dam tshig la gnas pa ni rin po

che'i skyes bu zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/ 'di ni brtan pas mchog tu gzung bar rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs so/ /de las gzhan pa'i slob ma ni dad pa sngon du 'gro bas byang chub la dmigs nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang bla ma la dad pa rgya chen po byed pa

yang ci rigs par gzung bar bya ste gang zag gi rim pa bzhin sbyar ro/ /de las gzhan pa ni slob ma dang tshogs pa'i bdag nyid gang dang yang mi ldan pa de ni 'dir mi gnang zhing dgag par bya'o/ /de ltar snod dang snod ma yin pa rnams brtags la slob dpon bdag nyid khang pa'i nang du

'jug go/ /de nas skal pa dang ldan pa'i slob mas kyang sgo drug du gnas te/ dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa pos / /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /byang chub sems

ni bdag la stsol / /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol / /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon pos bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /de ltar lan gsum gsol ba btab nas slob dpon 'khor lo'i gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas

tshig 'dis gnang ba sbyin te/ bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags spyod yul cho ga dag /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /rdo rje gsang sngags bsgom pa yis/ /

dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /'jig rten rjes 'jug par rtogs nas/ /'khor lo

bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di byos shig /ces smra'o/ /de nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / yongs su bsngo ba dang / byang chub tu

sems bskyed pa dang / bdag nyid kyi lus dbul ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang / mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa bzung ba dang smon lam gdab par bya'o/ /dkon mchog

gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa ni slob mas tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing bya'o/ /sdom pa gzung ba ni dang po slob dpon gyis bsgo ste 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song / /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i//

dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag /blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar gyis/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /shes rab dril bu zhes grags so/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar gyis/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig

sdom pa yin par gsungs/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar gyis/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i/ /

dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya/ /srog chags rnams ni gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang mi slang ngo / /'dod chags dag kyang mi bya zhing / /

brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba ste/ /chang ni rnam par spang bar bya/ /sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs par/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad spang / /dam pa nye bar brten bya zhing / /rnal 'byor pa kun bsnyen bkur bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dag /ngag gi rnam

pa bzhi dag dang / /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni/ /ci nus par yang rjes su bsrung / /sems can don la mi phyogs dang / /theg pa dman la dgod mi bya/ /'khor ba dag kyang yongs mi spong / rtag tu mya ngan 'dar mi chags/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /de la brnyas par mi

bya zhing / /phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang / /mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya'o/ /de ltar dam tshig gsungs pa dag /blo ldan khyod kyis rtag tu srungs / /de nas bla ma des gsungs pa'i/ /sdom pa legs par gzung bya'o/ / tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / /dge

ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i/ /sdom pa deng nas gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs

mchog chen po yi/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /

pad+ma'i rigs mchog chen po la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchod chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /

dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can ma lus don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung / /ma rgal ba dag bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba dag bdag gis dgrol / /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs pa byung zhing / /mya ngan 'das la dgod par bgyi/ /lus dang ngag dang

yid dag gis/ /mi dge ba ni bcu po dag /bag med pa yi gnas gyur pa/ /chang ni rnam par spang bar bya/ /de bzhin lha dang lha min dang / /gsang ba pa dag brnyas pa dang / /mtshan ma la sogs 'gom pa rnams/ /dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni/ /ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/ /

bdag ni rab tu ldog par bgyi/ /de ltar sdom pa bzung ba'i slob ma la snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral bar rdo rje khu tshur gyis dri'i thig le gsum byas te/ nyi ma dang pad+ma dang zla ba la yi ge gsum so sor bkod la sku dang gsung dang thugs su byin gyis brlab cing / las thams cad pa'i sngags

kyis bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa byas te spyi bor me tog dang spos so / /mar me dang dri ni snying gar ro/ /lha bshos ni mdun du'o/ /de re re la yang tshig 'di sngon du 'gro bas sbyin te/ dus 'di nyid nas bzung nas ni/ /'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos par/ /mchod pa kun dang

ldan pa ni/ /dus kun du ni bde bar mnos/ /zhes pas so/ /de nas las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis mngon par bsngags pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis pa shing drang po 'o ma can las byung ba srin bus ma zos pa/ bu ga dang mdzes pa med pa drang pos byas pa la dri zhim pos byugs

shing rtse mo me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa slob ma shar phyogs su kha bltas te mi smra bar so shing bca'o/ /bza' ba zin nas mdun drang por dor ro/ /de nas so shing gi rtse mo'i ltas blta ste/ phyogs mtshams kyi dbye bas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las brgyad 'grub pa'am/ yang na

bdag la lta ba'am rtse mo gyen du 'greng na dngos grub mchog 'grub po/ /de bzhin du shar du bltas na dngos grub 'bring 'grub bo/ /mtshams dang byang du bltas na 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub 'grub po/ /thur du bltas nas 'og gi dngos grub 'grub bo/ /de nas ngag gi nyes pa sbyang

ba'i phyir 'thor 'thung byas te kha bkrus nas hub gsum 'thung du gzhug pa'i sngags ni/ oM hrIH bi shud+d+hA ya sar+b+ba d+harmAya sar+b+ba pA paM ni tsa saM [(]shod+hA [,]shod+d+hA [)]ya / sar+b+ba bi kalpa a ba na ya hUM/ zhes bzlas la chu khyor ba gsum 'thung du gzhug go/ /'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams/ /u dum+bA ra'i me

tog bzhin/ /brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung ngo / /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /gang gis mnyam med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /bskal pa bye ma du ma ru/ /sdig pa byas par gyur

pa gang / /de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra ba/ /mthong bas 'byang bar 'gyur yin na / /grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i/ /tshul la gnas pa smos ci dgos/ /skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni/ /go 'phang bla na med par 'gyur/ /gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la/ /blo gros

shin tu mi g.yo ba/ /de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcad/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed/ /gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas la/ /bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni/ /bstan pa 'di la

khyed rnams kun/ /yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa/ /de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la/ /sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyed rnams der ni dong bas na/ /rang 'byung skal ba chen po la/ /'jig rten

thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba yin/ /yod dang med las rnam par 'das/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med/ /zab mo rtog ge thams cad kyis/ /rab tu mi rtogs gnas med pa/ /spros pa kun dang bral ba ste/ /spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa/ /las

dang bya ba la sogs bral/ /bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi/ /theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di yi/ /tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur/ / zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di dag ni theg pa chen po'i chos bshad pas spro ba yang dag par bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i srung skud

mdud pa gsum bor ba dpung ba g.yon pa la gdags so/ /de nas sngags kyis btab pa'i ku sha la sngas dang stan byas te/ rmi lam gyi ltas blta'o / /rmi lam gyi ltas mthong ba dge ba'am mi dge ba nang par dus su nga la zlos shig ces bsgo'o/ /rmi lam mi dge ba na las thams cad pa'i sngags

kyis gzhom mo/ /de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te/ nam mkha'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bkod la dra ba dang ra bas kha sbyar gyi sbyor bas bsrung te gzhag go/ /de dag ni [(]lta [,]sta [)]gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas slob dpon rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas rang

bzhin gyis dkyil 'khor bskul ba'i phyir nam mkha' la gdab pa'i skud pa dang tshon gyis dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir sa la gdab pa dang gnyis bya ste/ de la thog mar rang gi phyag rgya ma bslabs pa 'byongs pa dang thig skud bkal te/ de nas tshon lnga so sor btsos nas bdud rtsi lnga dang dri zhim pos

byugs shing gser la sogs pa'i snod gtsang mar bzhag la/ rigs re re la yang rang rang gtso bor byas pa'i lnga lnga yod pas skud pa re re la yang lnga lnga ste nyi shu rtsa lnga bya'o/ /sngags pas bdag nyid kyi mig g.yas g.yon la dza dkar dmar las bskyed pa'i nyi zla bskyed la/

de nyid la yang rdzas so sor mtshon pa mig gi gzim ma 'dren par byed pa'i 'bar ba'i lta bas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du bltas te/ dza las 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyus ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka nas ye shes kyi skud pa drangs te/ yi ge lngas drang pa'i dam tshig gis

skud pa la thim par byas nas/ las thams cad pa'i dri'i chus bsang gtor byas pa'i dri dang me tog la sogs pa phul nas/ oM AHoM hUM / oM AHswA hUM / oM AHAH hUM/ oM AH hU hUM/ oM AH hUM hUM/ zhes bzlas so/ /'khal zhing sgril ba'i dus su yang / oM a n+yo n+yA nu ga ta

sar+b+ba d+har+m+mA pa ra spa ra a nu ga ta sar+b+ba d+har+m+mAH ad+yan+tA nu ga ta sar+b+ba d+har+m+mA nu pra be sha ya sar+b+ba d+har+m+mA hUM/ zhes rjes su dran pas bzlas shing bsgril lo/ /de nas tshon sna gcig pa'i las thams cad pa'i skud pa byas te dri zhim po dang bdud rtsi lnga dang las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i yungs kar bsres pa sbangs

te/ tsan+dan dkar po'i chus byug par bya'o/ /skud pa yi ge gsum gyi nang du chud par bya'o/ /skud pa bsngogs shing bzung nas dz+dza gsum gyis bton la rang rang gi phyag rgya ma la gtad par bya'o/ /shes rab med par bdag nyid gcig pu spyod na slob dpon rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas la

slob ma rnam par snang mdzad dam bdud rtsi thab sbyor du bsams te shar gyi sgor gnas par bya'o/ /nub dang shar na gnas pa'i slob dpon slob mas khu tshur g.yon gyis bzung nas/ oM badzra sa mA ya sU tra ma ti kra ma hUM/ zhes brjod pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'gro ba sems can gyi don gyi phyir gshegs shig par thig gi sgras bskul bar bsam par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gnod sbyin gyi phyogs su kha bltas la slob ma gshin rje'i phyogs su kha bltas te nam mkha' la thig gdab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du klu dang

brgya byin gyi phyogs su kha bltas la thig gnyis pa gdab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du grwa dang phyogs la sogs pa gdab par bya'o/ /de la dang po ni tshangs pa'i thig go/ /gnyis pa ni grwa'i thig go/ /gsum pa ni phyi rol gyi thig go/ /bzhi pa ni so sor cha rnam par dbye ba'i

thig go/ /de nas nam mkha' la btab pa bzhin du sa la gdab par bya ste/ tshangs thig gi g.yas g.yon du ri mo dgu dgu btab pas cha bcu bcur 'gyur te/ spyir cha chen po nyi shur 'gyur ro/ /de re re'i nang du thig gsum gsum btab pas snam bu bzhi bzhir 'gyur te/ des cha phran brgyad

cur 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du tshangs thig gnyis pa'i g.yas g.yon yang gdab par shes par bya'o/ / de la lnga pa'i dang pos ning ba'i tshon sna lnga'i sa bya'o/ /lnga pa bzhi pas ni 'gram gyi tshon sna lnga'i sa bya'o/ /drug pa'i gsum pas ni sgo'i steng logs kyi tshon sna lnga'i sa bya'o/ /dang po'i

gsum pas ni sgo khyud kyi tshon sna lnga'i sa bya'o/ /gnyis pa'i gnyis pas ni logs kyi tshon sna lnga'i sa bya'o/ /dang po'i bzhi pa dang gnyis pa'i dang pos ni khyams kyi sa bya'o/ /lnga pa'i gnyis pa dang gsum pas ni kha khyer gyi sa bya'o/ /lnga pa'i bzhi pas kha khyer gyi sa bya'o/ /drug pa'i dang

po dang gnyis pas dra ba dang dra phyed kyis bya'o/ /des ni dkyil 'khor gyi gnas bsgrub pa'o/ /dang po'i bzhi pas ni nang gi ka ba'i sa bya'o/ /gnyis pa'i gsum pas ni phyi'i ka ba'i sa bya'o/ /de nas tsan+dan gyi phur bu la/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+hAM baM hUM/ zhes lan bdun bzlas pas

dbus kyi lte ba la btab la gsum pa'i gsum pa la rdo rje ra ba'i sar ri mo gnyis su g.yas skor du zlum por bskor bar bya'o/ /de nas dgu pa'i dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa gsum ri mo gnyis kyis bskor ba khor yug te pad+ma'i phreng pa'i sa bya'o/ /de'i 'og gi cha gsum la nang gi phyed dang

gnyis kyis ni khor yug chen po ste phyi rol gyi rdo rje ra ba'i sa bskor bar bya'o/ /de dag kyang dang po ri mo nang nas bskor ro/ /de nas phyi rol nas bskor te/ de'i lhag ma phyed dang gnyis kyis ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /tha ma'i cha bran stong pa gnyis kyis ni dkyil 'khor gyi nye 'khor gyi sa bya'o/ /

de nas gsum pa'i bzhi pa la 'dod pa'i lha mo'i snam bu'o/ /bzhi pa'i dang po dang bzhi pa'i gnyis pa dang bzhi pa'i gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i bzhi pa rnams gcig tu byas pa ni sgo dang 'brel pa'i phyi'i snam bu'o/ /de nas mig gnyis la d+hi las nyi zla bskyed pa'i khro bo'i lta bas nang gi

thig gdab nas khro bo'i mig gi lta stangs kyi 'od zer gyis bgegs bsal la phyi'i thig gdab par bya ste/ sngar btab pa rnams la ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o/ /de la ra ba'i tshon sna lnga dang 'gram gyi tshon sna lnga sgo dang 'brel pa phyi'i sgo'i nang dang sgo khyud kyis bya'o/ /rta babs bzhi ni

chur sgo'i bzhi 'gyur snam phran bcu drug gi tshad do/ /de la chu srin gyi mgo la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams dgod pa'i sa bya'o/ /ra ba dang 'brel pa'i snam phran dang po dang gnyis pa la gar mkhan gyi lha mo mchod pas phyag brel pa rnams so/ /gsum pa la ni rin chen pha gu'i sa'o/ /bzhi pa

dang lnga ba la ni dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang nyi zla'o/ /drug pa la rdo rje nor bu phyed pa'o/ /sgo'i logs dang 'gram rnams su rnga yab 'bar ba dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rlung gis bskyod pa'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i g.yas g.yon du ri dgas kyis mtshan pa/ phyi rol gyi grwa bzhir gser gyi

bum pa brgyad dang mchod pa la sogs pa ci rigs par bri bar bya'o/ /de yang / thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis rnams par brgyan/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /ka pa brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/ /dra ba dra phyed rdo rje dang / /

nor bu zla bas brgyan pa'o/ /sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /bum pa ka ba rdo rje phyed/ /bre yi phreng ni rim bzhin gnas/ /ba dan dril bus mdzes byas la/ /rnga yab rnams kyis rnam par brgyan/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ni/ /mchod

pa rnam pa lnga yis brgyan/ /khru ni bcu gnyis tshad dang ldan/ /tshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /bum pa brgyad dang ldan pa bri/ /kun nas yongs su zlum por bya/ /de dag ni thig gi cho ga'o// //de nas rdul tshon byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ kha dog lnga la hUM la sogs pa kha dog lnga dang

ldan pa so sor bstims la/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bsdu ba la sogs pa thig gi cho ga bzhin bya ste/ tshon rtsi 'od 'bar bar bsams te/ oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya ma ti kra ma hUM/ zhes brjod pas byin gyis brlabs te/ chos dbyings 'di ni rnam par dag /

sems can khams ni rnam grol mdzad/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che/ /rdul tshon mi phyed ngo bo nyid/ /ces pa'o/ /de nas slob mas g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te sgo'i steng logs kyi tshad du bri bar bya'o/ /de yang phyi rol nas brtsams te thog mar ni

dkar po'o/ /de nas ni ser po'o/ /de nas ni dmar po'o/ /de nas ni ljang gu ste nang rol ni nag po'o/ /de yang sbom phra dang yon po dang g.yon skor la sogs pa'i skyon spangs te bri'o/ /de nas dbus nas bri'o/ /de nas las kyi rdo rje la sogs pas ci bder bri'o/ /dbus dang shar la sogs

pa'i re'u cha rnams ni nag po dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu go rims bzhin no/ /mchod snam ni dmar po'o/ / sgo dang sgo'i snam bu ni phyogs kyi snam bu'o/ /de nas rdul tshon gyi bgegs 'byung ba lnga las byung ba rnams ni sku'i dkyil 'khor la ni gshin rje gshed kyi
