sbyor bas gzhom mo/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor la ni rta mgrin gyi sbyor bas so/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sbyor bas sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gang la yang sbyar du rung ngo / /'dir ni rdo rje 'chang gi dkyil 'khor yin pas na gnod mdzes kyi sbyor bas bgegs gzhom par bya ste/ oM sum+b+ha ni

sum+b+ha hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bA na bid+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ ces brjod cing gnod mdzes kyi tsham ngam gyis srung zhing rnam par 'phru pas bgegs kyi tshogs 'jig par byed pa 'di la som nyi mi bya'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas

de nas phyag rgya dgod par bya ste/ hUM la sogs pa gsung gi phyag rgya'am/ rdo rje la sogs pa thugs kyi phyag rgya'am/ phyag dang zhabs la sogs pa sku'i phyag rgya bri bar bya ste/ de la 'dir re zhig thugs kyi mtshan ma'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa gsungs te/ dbus su ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang

nyi ma'i steng du kha dog sngon po'i rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhir sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba dang rin po che dang / pad+ma dang rgya gram gyi gdan gyi steng du 'khor lo dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / ral gri kha dog so sor bri bar bya'o/ /me'i gra la sogs pa'i

mtshams bzhi ru ni pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i steng du ut+pal dkar po dang / sngon po cung zad rtsa ba dmar ba dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu ste/ spyan la sogs pa'i thugs kyi mtshan ma so sor dgos par bya'o/ /'dod pa'i yon tan gyi snam bu'i grwa bzhir me long dang / pi wang dang / dri'i

dud dang / ro'i snod thod pa ste/ pad+ma'i steng na zla ba la gnas pa'i gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rim pa bzhin du dgod do/ /snam bu gsum pa la pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i byams pa'i klu shing dang gzhan sems dpa' dag ni gtso bo'i kha dog dang phyag mtshan dang mthun par bri'o//

khro bo rnams ni pad+ma'i steng na nyi ma la gnas pa'i shar sgor gshin rje gshed kyi dbyug to'o/ /lho'i sgor ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rdo rje'i dbyug to'o/ /nub sgor ni rta mgrin gyi pad+ma 'od rnon po dang bcas pa'o/ /byang sgor ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi rdo rje rgya gram mo/ /shar lho mtshams/

ni mi g.yo mgon gyi ral gri'o/ /lho nub mtshams su ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i lcags kyu'o/ /nub byang mtshams su ni dbyug sngon gyi rdo rje dbyug pa'o/ /byang shar mtshams su ni stobs po che'i tri shU la'o / /shar stod du ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa

gtsug tor gyis mtshan pa'o/ /nub smad du ni gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje'o/ /de yang rang gi sngags bzlas shing thun mtshams su bri'o/ /de dag ni tshon dgye ba'i rim pa'o/ /de nas phyag rgya ma legs par 'byongs pa dang / dang po sbyor bas snyoms par 'jug pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /shes rab

kyi chos 'byung nas/ badzra d+h+r-ika la sogs pa'i lha so so'i mtshan gyi sngags kyis bton nas so so'i gdan la rdzogs par bsgom zhing / de nas ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i 'od zer las khro bo'i rgyal po gnod mdzes 'phro bas phyogs bcu'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo dam tshig gi 'khor lo la spyan

drangs la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod de/ gshin rje gshed la sogs pas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te/ dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo la ni rnam par snang mdzad nas gnod mdzes kyi bar gyis spyi bo nas rkang pa'i bar du

dgod pa'o/ /gnas gsum du sku gsung thugs rdo rje gsum po dgod pa dang / sems dpa' gsum gyi mthar thug pa dgod cing byin gyis brlab po/ 'khor gyi lha rnams la ni sku gsung thugs rdo rje dang / ye shes sems dpa' dang bzhi ste phyag rgya chen po dang / chos dang /

las dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab par bya'o/ /'di dag ni dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mnyes par bya ste/ me tog gi char gyis ni lha rnams kyi dbu la'o/ /dri dang bdug spos kyis ni

shangs la'o/ /byug sbos kyis thugs la'o/ / mar me ni spyan la'o/ /lha bshos ni ljags la'o/ /dril bu ni snyan la'o/ /yon chab dang zhabs bsil ni phyag dang zhabs la'o/ /de dag kyang / mchod pa rnam pa lnga la mchog bstan / /zhes gsungs pas 'jig rten pa dang thun mong ma

yin pa ting nge 'dzin sems pa'i 'od zer las byung bas na nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa'i sprin gyi char byung bar bsam mo/ /de nas nang gi mchod pa byas te / phyag rgya dang snyoms par 'jug pa las bla na med pa'i mchod pa brtsam ste/

byang chub sems kyi phra rab bsags pa las nam mkha'i khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas gang bar bsams la/ de dag kyang thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i mchod pas mnyes pa 'di ni nang gi mchod pa'o/ /de nas bdud rtsi lnga dang / dpa' bo lnga kha zas sbyang

ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyangs la dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la dbul bar bya zhing bdag nyid kyang tshim par bya ba 'di nyid ni gsang ba'i mchod pa'o/ /de nas bstod pa dang bzlas pas mnyes par bya te/ de'i rjes la phyir byung la gtor ma dang mchod pas phyogs skyong rnams so sor mnyes par

bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du song ste/ stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang gtsug tor la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i hUM mdzad kyi skur bsgyur la dkyil 'khor gyi g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba lan gsum byas te / phyag byas nas me tog gi phreng ba

sngon po dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo la phul te/ slar blangs nas bdag gi mgo bo la bcings nas lhas gnang bar bsams pa 'dis ni rdzas dang yo byad la sogs pa'i dri ma thams cad dag par 'gyur ro/ /'di dag ni mchod pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas shar phyogs su kha bltas te/

rgyas pa'i las dang 'brel pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mnyes par bya'o/ /sbyin sreg gi cho ga ni 'og nas ston pas 'dir ma bstan no/ /de nas bdag nyid 'jug par bya ste / byang chub tu sems bskyed la me tog 'thor ba'i bar gyis zhugs la phreng ba nas rjes su gnang ba'i bar

gyis bka'i gnang ba thob par byas la slob ma gzhug par bya ba'i ched du bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa brjod par bya ste/ nam mkha'i skye ba mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /sems dpa'i rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /kun mchog dngos grub

chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod/ /nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod/ /'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod/ /shin tu dag pa

kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog /grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa/ /rdo rje snyems pa bdag mdzod cig /

sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing / /sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs/ /sems can kun gyi yab gyur cing / /'dod chags dam tshig mchog gyur pa'o/ /bden pa 'di yis ye shes mchog /shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor yin/ /bden pa de yis mgon bdag la//

khyod kyis 'dod pa rab rdzogs mdzod/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung / /de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes/ /bden pa 'di yis dkyil 'khor

du/ /gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni/ /kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog /ces lan gsum brjod do/ /'di dag ni slob dpon 'jug pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas dkyil 'khor chen po dang slob ma'i bar du yol bas bcad nas las thams cad pa'i chus bkrus pa'i ras

dmar po'i gdong g.yogs kyis bkab la/ sdug pa khyod su yin zhes lan gsum dri'o/ /des kyang sdug pa bdag ni skal ba bzang po'o/ /zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de nas me tog phreng ba 'dzin pas sgor yang dag par mchod par bya'o/ /de bzhin du/ yul 'khor

khyim dang glang po rta/ /gser dang mu tig byi ru dang / /nor bu dang ni khyad par rdzas/ /bu dang chung ma bdag nyid dang / /bran pho bran mo bcas rnams kun/ /deng nas brtsams te dbul bar bgyi/ /zhes yon gyi bye brag dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas snying gar rdo rje bzhag la/

oM sarba yo ga tsit+ta u tA tA yA mi/ /su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM ho/ /zhes pas byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ /sid+d+hi badzrA ya tha su khaM/ zhes pas 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o/ /deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cig /dad pa dang mi ldan pa rnams la yang ma yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i gsang sngags kyis yol ba'i nang du bkug cing tshud par byas nas sam yang na/ a khaM

bI ra hUM/ zhes bya ba'i yi ge lnga yis nang du chud par byas la de nas snga ma bzhin du sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug ste/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyi / ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyang thob na/ dngos grub

gzhan lta ci smos te/ de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yi / dngos grub 'di dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra shig dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag la/ oM rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/ /snying la yang

dag zhugs par gyur/ /oM badzra sa tA hUM/ gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas thod pa na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi 'thung du gzhug te/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos

grub ster/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung shig /oM badzra ud ga ThaH / de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis ngas 'di byos shig ces brjod pa gang yin pa de yang bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /mi bde ba ma spangs

pas khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar lhung bar gyur ta re zhes brjod do/ /de nas de skad smras pa la/ slob mas 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlobs shig /rdo rjes sems dpa' bdag la 'bar par gyur cig ces gsol ba lan gsum gdab par bya'o//

de nas dbab snod slob ma de snang ba mtha' yas su bsams la/ yan lag thams cad la yi ge a dmar po bkod la snying gar laM yongs su gyur pa las dbang chen ser po grub bzhi grwa bzhi la rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa de'i dbus su yi ge hUM ngo / /baM yongs su gyur pa las chu'i

dkyil 'khor zlum po bum pas mtshan pa lte bar bsam/ yaM yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu 'dra ba ba dan gyis mtshan pa rkang pa'i 'og tu'o/ /raM las me'i dkyil 'khor gsum mdoms su bsam/ mgrin par AH / spyi bor ha/ de nas 'od zer 'bar ba'i dz+haiM

rkang mthil nas rkang gi bu gnas rlung gis me sbar ba la sogs pa'o/ /badzra a be sha ya ste b+ha ya ra ra ra ra/ tsa la ya tsa la ya/ hUM a ha dz+haiM/ zhes dril bu'i sgra dang bcas pas dbab par bya'o/ /phebs pa dang tiSh+Tha badzra/ zhes pas brtan par bya ste/ de nas lce la yi ge a dmar po

bsams la/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i gtam yongs su smros shig ces dri'o/ /de nas me tog gi phreng ba/ pra tIts+tsha badzra ho/ /zhes brjod la dkyil 'khor du dor ro/ /me tog gang la bab pa de ni de'i lha'o/ /me tog bab ba'i mtshan ma ni lha'i re'u cha'i gnas

las shes bar bya'o/ /de yang sku stod dang spyi gtsug tu bab na dngos grub mchog 'grub bo/ /zhal la bab na sngags kyi dngos grub 'grub bo/ /sku'i dbus su bab na dngos grub brgyad do/ /sku smad du bab na zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub po/ /sku dang nye na ni dngos grub nye ba'o/ /ring

na ni dngos grub ring ngo / /gnyis kyi bar du lhung na ni gang nye ba'i rigs so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gnas las phyi rol du rgal na dad pa chung ste dman ba'i dngos grub 'grub bo/ /re khA la phog na skyar la dor ro/ /snying po la phog na gang yang rung ba 'grub po/ /bar mnyam po'am bdag

gi mdun du lhung na lan gsum spogs te dor ro/ /des kyang nang du ma phog na skal ba med bas slar gtang ngo / /de dag ni slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas babs ba'i lha de rnams kyis phreng ba mgo la bcing zhing / oM pra ti gr-ih+Na swa mi maM sa twa ma hA ba la / zhes brjod pas phreng

bas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas mig gis ji ltar mthong zhes dri'o/ /dkar po mthong na dngos grub mchog 'grub pa'o / /ser po mthong na rgyas pa'i ye shes so/ / nag po mthong na mngon spyod kyi ye shes so/ /sna tshogs pa mthong nas gang yang rung ba'i dngos grub bo/ /de nas / rdo rje

sems dpa' deng khyod kyi / /mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad pa/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /ces brjod la sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM badzra satwa sa man+ta tsak+ShU d+g+ha Ta na ta da pa ra/ ud+g+ha Ta ya ti sar+b+bA k+Sho badzra tsak+Shu a nut+ta ra/ zhes brjod la

gdong g.yogs bkrol te/ de nas gnod mdzes nas brtsams te rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bar du lha rnams bstan to/ /de nas phyag rgya ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od zer nyungs kar lta bus nam mkha'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbab cing bskul te/

bum pa na gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa yab yum la thim nas/ de yongs su gyur pa'i chus spyi bor chu'i dbang bskur te tshigs bcad dang sngags 'dis sbyin no/ /gsang gsum dam tshig las byung ba'i/ /ye shes bdud rtsi dri ma med/ /lha yi chu yis dag pa yi / /mi bskyod pa yi

dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra A daR+sha dz+nyA na a b+hi Shi ny+tsa/ zhes pa'o/ /de bzhin du bris pas sam lugs ma'i dbu rgyan la dar gyi cod pan gyis mtshan pa la rin chen 'byung ldan yab yum bsgoms la/ snga ma bzhin du nam mkha'i dbyings na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad phab pas de yongs su gyur pa'i dbu rgyan gyis dbang bskur ro/ /'di skad du/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal srid che/ /dbu rgyan rin chen dam pa ste/ /rin chen kun gyi mchog 'gro bas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas su dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra sa man+tA dz+nyA na rat+na ma ku Ti a b+hi Shiny+tsa/

zhes pas so/ /rdo rje 'od dpag med pa yab yum gyis dbang bskur bar bsgoms te/ snga ma'i cho gas ye shes sems dpa' phab ste/ de yongs su gyur ba'i rdo rjes dbang bskur ro/ /'di skad du/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang / /mi phyed rdo rje'i 'od gsal ba/ /dam chos

'byung ba'i sgor gyur pas/ /rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM pra ti a be sha dz+nyA na badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ zhes pas so/ /dril bul don yod grub pa yab yum rdzogs par bsgoms te/ snga ma bzhin du phab ba'i cho ga byas la de yongs su gyur ba'i rdo rje dang dril bu'o/ / rdo rje dang dril bu

bsnol la bdag po'i dbang bskur ro/ / 'di skad du/ thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi/ /'gro don mnyam med byed ba dang / /mchod ba'i las kun rdzogs byed pas/ /rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra kri ta a nu Sh+ShA na dz+nyA na badzra ba te a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ zhes pa'o/ /de nas snga ma

bzhin du me long gi gzugs la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sku phab la/ de yongs su gyur pa me long du byas te/ me long gi gzugs slob ma la bstan te 'di skad du brjod do/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'i/ /dag cing gsal la dri ma med/ /me long nang gi gzugs

brnyan bzhin/ /rang lha'i gzugs ni shes par gyis/ /oM pra ti bi ma la A daR+sha bi ma la a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ zhes pas so/ /de bzhin du spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad yab yum bsgoms la snga ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phab la de yongs su gyur ba

las spyi bo nas rkang pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du lus la khyab par bstims la bab pa'i lha'i cha las ming btags te/ ming ni thog mar dpal tha mar rdo rje'o/ /de'i 'og tu gnang ba'i phyir de ni kye yis bod pa'o/ /'di skad du/ /rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas/ /byang chub

snying po'i bar du ni/ /cis kyang mi shig mi g.yo bas/ /rdo rje'i ming du rab tu grags/ /oM bi shud+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ zhes pas so/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig med par ni slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'i snod ma yin pas/ rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi

khyad par gyi dam tshig dbog ste/ hUM yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rje lag tu gtad la 'di skad du/ 'di nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung / /thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /

ces pa ni rdo rje'i dam tshig go/ /de bzhin du aH yongs su gyur pa las dril bu byin la/ 'di skad du/ /dril bu de nyid kyis zung la/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi / /shes rab sgra yi rjes 'gro bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /byang chub nga rgyal rdo rje bzhed/ /chos

kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog /srid pa mchog ni mdzad pa yin/ /zhes ba ni dril bu'i dam tshig go/ /de bzhin du oM de'i lus la bstims la/ 'di skad du/ snying po bsnyen pa sogs

spyad pas / /phyag rgya chen por byin brlabs la/ /gzugs sogs 'dod pa'i dam tshig gis/ /gsang sngags ma tshang med par bzlas/ /rang rig pa yi ngo bo nyid/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum bzhugs pa ste/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par gyis/ /

dka' thub sdom pa mi bzad pas/ /bsten nas mi snang mngon shes dang / /mkha' la rgyu dang lus ngag yid/ /las byung dngos grub 'grub mi 'gyur/ /de bas sangs rgyas sems dpa' mchog /sngags kyi spyod mchog spyod pa rnams/ /'dod pa thams cad bsten pa yis//

chos kyi yi ge mchog nyid brnyes/ /bde dang sdug bsngal bde bdag min/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams bsten/ /ye shes don gnyer 'dod chags can/ /sbyor bas bsgrubs na myur du 'grub/ /sku gsung thugs ni yang dag 'grub/ /gang gzhan dman par bshad pa ni/ /sngags kyi bzlas pas

'grub par 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms pas so/ /zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya'i dam tshig go/ /de ltar sdom pa bzung ba'i slob mas de bzhin du yon gyis slob dpon mnyes bar byas la/ bla ma la phyag btsal la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis dbang nod pa'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /byang chub rdo rjes

sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchod chen gsol mdzad pa/ /bdag la bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol / /zhes gsol ba gdab po/ /de nas shar gyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor chen po dang bar du khru 'am 'dom gyis chod par dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin du

bris la/ de'i steng du dbang stegs kyi khri bya ste/ ras la gdan pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa g.yas dang g.yon du seng ges mtshan pa bzhag ste steng du yang gdugs dang bla res bkab pa dang / g.yas g.yon du yang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis bklubs la/ de nas slob dpon sbyor

pa gsum rdzogs par bsgoms nas snga ma bzhin du thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od zer gyis nam mkha'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul nas bum pa'i nang du chud par byas te/ de dag kyang spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis bzung

nas/ gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la sogs pas nam mkha'i khams gang ste de dag gi rig ba'i dbang bskur ba'i tshigs bcad ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba/ /khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa/ /gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi / /

sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin par bya/ /zhes so/ /de nas rdo rje brtul zhugs dang / lung bstan pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pas dbugs dbyung ba la sogs pa byin la/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang / lha'i de kho na nyid bstan te / de yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcu gnyis

dag pa ni khru bcu gnyis so/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi rnam par dag pa zur bzhi'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnam par dag pa ngos bzhi'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnam par dag pa ni shar phyogs kyi sgo'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnam par dag pa ni lho'i sgo'o/ /rdzu 'phrul

gyi rkang pa bzhi rnam par dag pa ni nub phyogs kyi sgo'o/ /dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang stobs lnga dag pa ni byang phyogs kyi sgo'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi rnam par dag pa ni sgo bzhi'o/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad dag pa ni ka ba brgyad do/ /rdo rje theg pa'i sgo nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas na rdo rje'i theg pa

dang ldan pa'o/ /tshon sna lnga ni sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin no/ /yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'i phyir dbus kyi pho brang zlum po rdo rje'i phreng ba zlum po bskor ba'o/ /ting nge 'dzin bzhi rnam par dag pa ni kha khyer ro// gzungs kyi sgo bzhi rnam par dag pa ni lha mo'i

tshogs mchod pas phyag brel ba'o/ /dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa la sogs pas brgyan pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun no/ /de las gzhan dang gzhan pa'i rgyan dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang dril bus mtshan pa ni gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis pa'o/ /thabs kyi bye brag ma 'dres bar so

sor snang ba ni bar bar gyi tshon sna gcig pa'o/ / spos dang me tog la sogs pa mchod pa'i bye brag dang gar dang dbyangs la sogs pa ni bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor bla na med pa'i mchod pa nyams dga' ba'o / /gser gyi bum pa brgyad po ni tshogs rnam pa gnyis rdzogs pa'o/ /bde ba chen po'i gzhal yas

khang yin pas gzhal yas khang ngo / /dkyil ni snying bo'i don to/ /'khor ni rdzogs pa'i don to/ /de ni dkyil 'khor ro/ /de dag kun kyang tshig gi don dang rgya cher sbyar ro/ /de nas lha'i de kho na nyid bstan te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa lnga

ni me long lta bu dang mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog pa dang bya ba grub pa dang chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te/ rnam par snang mdzad dang / /rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / don yod grub pa dang / /mi bskyod pa ste go rims bzhin du rnam par dag pa'o/ /sa dang chu dang me dang

rlung gi khams ni spyan dang mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma ste go rims bzhin du rnam par dag pa yin te/ de tshad med pa bzhi'i rang bzhin no/ /gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg ni gzugs rdo rje dang / sgra rdo rje dang / ro rdo rje dang / rig rdo rje rnams

go rims bzhin du rnam par dag pa'o/ /thabs dang / smon lam dang / stobs dang / ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin no/ /mig dang / rna ba dang / /sna dang / lce dang / /lus dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / rtsa rgyus dang / chos ni sa'i snying po dang / nam

mkha'i snying po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / sgribs rnam par sel ba dang / byams pa dang / kun du bzang po ste go rims bzhin du rnam par dag pa yin te/ gtso bo'i yon tan gyi cha'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no/ /ser sna dang / mi snyan pa

dang / don mi mthun pa dang / don mi spyod pa ni gshin rje gshed dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / rta mgrin dang / bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang go rims bzhin du dag pa yin te/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don mthun pa dang / don spyod pa'i rang bzhin no/ /mig la sogs pa'i rnam

par shes pa drug ni/ mi g.yo mgon po dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / dbyug sngon can dang / stobs po che dang / gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang / gnod mdzes te go rims bzhin du dag pa yin no/ /de dag kyang rang rang gi gtso bo'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa la nges par zad pa

dang mi skye ba'i ye shes kyi yon tan du bstan to/ /'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po ste/ lha thams cad kyi ngo bor bstan to/ /de dag ni lha'i de kho na nyid do/ /de nas rjes su gnang

ba sbyin te/ 'di skad du/ ngo bo nyid kyi sems can rnams/ /ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba/ /de lta de ltar chags la sogs/ /gtsang bas sems can don bya'o/ /nyin re bzhin du thun bzhi ru/ /ting 'dzin gsum gyi sbyor ldan par/ /gyur nas thun mong cig

shos kyi/ /dngos grub thob pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi snang ba ni stong yin te/ /mngon shes ldan pa nyis stong yin/ /rig pa 'dzin pa sum stong ste / /rdo rje can ni 'gro kun bdag /zhi dang rgyas la sogs gang dang / /de las gzhan pa ci 'dod pa/ /'khor lo rjes mnyam sbyor

ba yis / /bsgrubs na 'grub par myur du 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pas rgyud nyan pa dang / 'chad pa dang / mchog dang thun mong sgrub pa dang / zhi ba la sogs pas sems can gyi don byed pa ste/ de dag thams cad byed par rjes su gnang ba sbyin no/ /de ltar phreng ba la sogs pa dgu po

des ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor du rig pa'i dbang bskur ba ste bum pa'i dbang gi cho ga'o// //de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba sngar gyi ri mo'i dkyil 'khor phyis pa la ba'i chus byugs pa dang / bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dang dri'i chus byugs pa ste/ me tog sil ma bkram la de

nas sngar lo'am zla bar mnyes par byas ba'i slob ma des pad+ma rA ga dang / nor bu dang rdo rje la sogs ba'i rin po che sna bdun dang / 'khor lo la sogs pa rgyal srid sna bdun dang / gzugs sdu gu'i bye brag sna tshogs dang / sgra snyan pa'i bye brag sna tshogs dang / dri zhim pa'i bye brag sna

tshogs dang / bza' btung la sogs pa'i ro zhim pa'i bye brag sna tshogs pa dang / gzugs kyi mchog pad+ma can mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa'i lo grangs bcu drug lon pa legs par bslabs pa la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi yo byad tshogs par bshams te/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus

su phyag rgya phul te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas cho ga ji lta bar mchod par bya'o/ /de nas gsang ba'i dbang la tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab bar bya'o/ /rdo rje sems khyod sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde ba 'grub ba ste/ rnam dag byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen sras su bcas pa rnams/ /yun

ring stong pa nyid bsgoms pas ni gdungs pa la/ /dga' ba'i yid 'ong bde ba chen po nyid kyis mnyes par mdzod/ /kye 'dod chags de ni dri med kun du bzang bo'i spyod pa ste/ /dga' ba'i 'dod chags rdo rje dam tshig la ni phye mdzad nas/ /dka' ba rnam pa drug po spyad pas shin tu gdungs

pa yi/ /rab tu dgyes dbang 'dod pa'i bde ba nyid kyis 'jog par mdzod/ /byang chub sems ni rin chen 'bar phyung bas / /ma lus rgyal ba rnams ni lus bskams la/ /rnam dag rdo rje las byung ye shes chu/ /dri med dri yi rin chen dbang bskur stsol/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam

dod chags tshul dag pas/ /pad+ma'i gnas su rdo rje mdzod gtong ba'i/ /sna tshogs sems dpa' sems can rlag 'gyur ba/ /sbyor ba gzhan min ma thogs bshad par gsol/ /rdo rje sems khyod sna tshogs bde bar byed pa yi/ /rdo rje pad+ma phye ba'i tshul gyis sbyor mdzad de/ /rgyal

ba kun gyi gzugs kyi sku ni rab ston nas/ /thams cad bde 'grub nyid kyis bdag dgyes par mdzod/ /de nas sngar tshogs kyi mchod pa'i sngon du bla mas kyang yid kyis sam/ /bris pas kyang tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la/ bdag po'i phyag rgyar mnyam par gzhag pas

snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs byang chub kyi sems pad+ma'i snod dam dung chos su bzhag ste/ rol mo dang glu dbyangs dang bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra dang bcas pas brtse bas nam phyed kyi dus su rdo rje can gnyis pa lta bur dmigs la dam tshig gi phyag rgyas slob ma'i lce la sbyin no/ /slob

mas kyang blo brtan pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kyis rang gi lus la gnas pa'i lha rnams mnyes par bya'o zhes bsams te/ a ho ma hA su kha/ zhes pas btung bar bya'o/ /de nas bstod pa 'dis bstod de/ khong stong khyod kyi sku la med/ /sha dang rus pa khrag med kyang / /

nam mkha' la ni 'ja' tshon ltar/ /khyod kyi sku ni ston par mdzad/ /sku la snyun med mi gtsang med/ /bkres dang skom pa 'byung med kyang / /khyod ni 'jig rten rjes 'jug phyir/ /'jig rten bya ba ston par mdzad/ /chu zla bzhin du gzung du med/ /chos rnams kun la gnas pa med/ /

nga rgyal med cing rmongs mi mnga'/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gshegs dang bzhugs dang de bzhin gzims/ /spyod lam dag ni thams cad du/ /khyod ni rtag tu mnyam gzhag pa/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting

'dzin gyis/ /rdzu 'phrul che la rnam 'phrul zhing / /sna tshogs min la snyoms 'jug pa/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bstod pa byas te/ de'i 'og tu bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bshad par gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ 'di skad du/ kun mkhyen ye

shes phung po can/ /srid pa'i 'khor lo rnam sbyong ba/ /de ring bshad pa'i rin chen gyis/ /gtso bos bdag la bka' drin gsol/ /khyod zhabs pad+ma spangs nas ni/ /gtso bo gzhan la skyabs ma mchis/ /'gro ba'i dpa' bo thub chen gyis/ /de bas slob ma mnyes par mdzod/ /ces

gsol ba gdab bo/ /bla mas kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi man ngag brgyud pa las 'ongs pa'i sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis nye bar mtshon pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i man ngag ji lta ba bzhin bstan to/ /de dag ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas dbang bskur ba yang dag par

thob pa'i slob mas thal mo sbyar la mchod cing bstod pas mnyes bar bya ste/ 'di skad du/ khams gsum las ni rnam grol zhing / /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur pa/ /'dod pa rnams kyis ma gos pa/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phung po rnams dang khams rnams dang / /

skye mched rnams la mi brten cing / /phyin ci log las rnam grol ba/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam rtog med cing kun rtog med/ /thugs ni rab tu mi gnas ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi gnas/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar nam mkha'

gnas med cing / /spros med gos pa med pa ltar/ /mkha' la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad stong ba'i rang bzhin can/ /mngon par byang chub blta bar 'tshal/ /slob mas thal sbyar bla ma la/ /bstod nas slar yang bskul bar

bya/ /las dang skye las rnam grol zhing / /snang ba gsum po spangs pa yis / /mngon par byang chub mthong bar ni/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ /mgon po chen po bdag

'tshal lo/ /thog mtha' med cing zhi ba dang / /nyon mongs thams cad rnam sbyong zhing / /lus dang ngag sems rnam sbyong ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar yang dag ba'i yon tan brjod pa sngon du 'gro ba tshigs su bcad ba dag gis yang dang yang du bstod pas mnyes

par byas te/ de'i 'og tu slob ma la snying rje bskyed do/ /phyi'i mngon par byang chub pa dang nang gi mngon par byang chub pa'i man ngag gis shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ro / /de dag ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o// //de ltar man ngag thob pa'i slob ma la ril bor

'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor dang / rjes su gzhig pa'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis legs bar bslab bar bya'o/ /de nas thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i dam tshig dang sdom pa gnyis bslab bar bya ste/ dbang bskur 'dir ni blta bar bya/ /byang chub spyod gzhan de bzhin du/ /dge ba'i tshul

ni gzhan gsungs par/ /sangs rgyas kun tshogs thob mi 'gyur/ /bu yis dam tshig bsrung ba dang / /rtag tu sdom pa bskyang ba dang / /bcu phyed sgron ma mi 'chi spyad/ /dam tshig gzhan yang bsrung ba ni/ /dkon mchog gnod byed gzhom bya ste/ /shes rab thams cad sad par bya/ /

gzhan gyi nor yang blang bar bya/ /rtag tu brdzun du smra bar bya/ /de las gzhan yang dam tshig ni/ /ji bzhin don ldan bcu bzhi dag /phas pham par ni rab tu grags/ /spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste/ /rtsa ba'i lhung bar shes par bya/ /slob dpon la ni brnyas pa dang / /bde gshegs bka'

las 'das pa dang / /sdang bas spun gyis bsngags min smra/ /byams pa chen po rnam spong dang / /byang chub sems ni 'dor ba dang / /theg pa gsum ni smod pa dang / /skal min gsang ba sgrogs pa dang / /rgyal ba'i phung po bdag nyid smod/ /dag pa'i chos la yid gnyis dang / /gdug

la byams dang chags bral dang / /chos la gnyis su dbye ba dang / /dad pa'i sems la rab tu btud/ /dam tshig bsnyen tshe ji snyed pa'i/ /brtags pa'i shes rab smod pa ste/ /sngags pas 'di dag byas na ni/ /kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba

yin par bshad/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /nyin re bzhin du bzlas par bya/ /kha na ma tho cher 'gyur bas/ /yan lag dam tshig bshad par bya/ /dam tshig mi ldan snod min la/ /rig ma bsten par dga' ba dang / /tshogs kyi 'khor lo rtsod pa dang / /gsang ba'i chos ni

ston pa dang / /sems can dad dang ldan la chos/ /gzhan du ston par 'gyur ba dang / /nyan thos dag tu rlom byed pa'i/ /nang du zhag bdun gnas pa dang / /sbyor ba nges par ma byas pa'i/ /snod min gsang ba bsgrags pa dang / /kha na ma tho cher gyur pa'i/ /sngags pa dam tshig

nyams par 'gyur/ /nad dang sdug bsngal rab tu 'phel/ /de bas dam tshig bus srungs shig /ces pas sdom pa sbyin no/ /de nas skad cig gis yi ge a de las shAkya thub pa'i cha lugs su bsgyur te/ g.yas pa la lung ston pa'i phyag rgya mgo bor bzhag ste lung bstan par bya'o/ /

oM nga yis 'di ltar lung bstan te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa'i mchog ni bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro nyid las bton/ /kye de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba sid+d+hi b+hur b+hu ba swaH / 'di yis dbang bskur gyur pa yi/ /sngags la 'gro ba

kun gyis bdag /bla na med pa'i byang chub tu/ /bde gshegs kyis kyang lung bstan mdzad/ /ces pas bla na med pa'i byang chub chen por lung bstan pa'o/ /de'i rjes su brtul zhugs sbyin par bya ste/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag na rdo rje'i lag tu 'dug /khyod kyis

kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha twAM d+har ya mi badzra sa twa hi hi hi hi hUM/ zhes pas sbyin no/ /de nas/ mchog gsang dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /mthong ba'am ni zhugs gyur pas/ /srid pa kun las nges grol bar/ /

de rnams de nyid legs par gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di la ni/ /slar khyod 'chi ba yong med de/ /mi thub pa dang mi sod pas/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das/ /srid pa shin tu dag pas na/ / ston

pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin/ /srid dang gtan du dngos grub po/ /dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di / /khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /dam pa rtag pa'i bka' yin no/ /byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya/ /phyag rgya rdo rje gang yin pa'o/ /gang

zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med/ /dam pa'i chos ni mi spang zhing / /nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /mi shes pa'am rmongs pa yi/ /tshul chen bstan par mi bya'o/ /bdag nyid yongs su spangs nas ni/ /dka' thub kyis ni mi gdungs par/ /ci bde bar ni

bde bar gzung / /'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams/ /nam yang yongs su mi 'dor zhing / /slob dpon smad par mi bya'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma yi/ /slob dpon la ni gang smod pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas

kun smad pas/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur/ /rims dang dgra dang dug dang nad/ /mkha' la 'gro rnams gtses pa dang / /gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis/ /bsad nas sems can dmyal bar ltung / /de bas nan tan thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che/ /

dge ba rab tu mi spyoms pa/ /nam yang smad par mi bya'o/ /bla ma la ni gus pas yon/ /rjes su mthun pa sbyin par bya/ /de nas rims sogs gnod pa rnams/ /phyir zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung / /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ /rtag

tu bla ma la yang dbul/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de sbyin bsod nams tshogs yin te/ /tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /gang phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas/ /deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur

bcas/ /lha dang dam tshig mnyam pa ru/ /deng khyod gyur par the tshom med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas par/ /kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas/ /khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che/ /rgyal ba'i bdag por bstan pa yin/ /de ni bdud las rnam

rgyal te/ /grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs/ /khyed rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas nyid/ /de nyid thob par the tshom med/ /de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis/ /rang gi dam tshig mi bzad bde skyed bsten par gyis/ /deng ni 'gro ba myur du rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /rab tu mnyam

zhing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par gyis/ /zhes pas rdo rje sems dpa'i sa la dbugs dbyung ba'o/ /de nas sngar bstan pa'i rjes su gnang ba sbyin no/ /de nas/ bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar bka' stsal pa ltar bgyi'o/ /zhes lan gsum gsol lo/ /de nas/ rin chen

khyim dang glang po rta/ /yul dang mal stan rnams dang ni/ /bran dang bran mo chung ma sdug /bu mo shin tu yid 'ong dang / /gang gis bdag kyang dbul bya na / /lhag ma rnams lta ci zhig smos/ /zhes pas mnyes par bya'o/ /des ni dbang bzhi pa yon dang bcas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas sbyin sreg

gi cho ga bya ste/ de la las so so'i sbyin sreg dang / las thams cad pa'i sbyin sreg go/ /de la las so so'i sbyin sreg ni de la zhi ba la ni zlum po rgyar khru gang zabs su de'i phyed do/ /rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi rgyar khru do/ zabs su khru gang ngo / /dbang la ni zla gam rgya dang zabs zhi ba dang mthun no/

mngon spyod la ni gru gsum rgyar sor nyi shu zabs su de'i phyed do/ /de dag kyang gru bzhi sgo bzhi dang ldan pa/ grwa bzhir zla ba phyed pa la rdo rje phyed pas mtshan pa sgo bzhir lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzhis mtshan pa thab kyi dbus kha khyer la yang zhi ba la ni 'khor lo dang 'khor lo'i phreng ba/ rgyas

pa la ni rin po che dang rin po che'i phreng ba/ dbang la ni pad+ma dang pad+ma'i phreng ba'o/ / mngon spyod la ni khro bo'i rdo rje gdengs pa dang de nyid kyi phreng ba'o/ /zhi ba la ni kha dog dkar po'o/ /rgyas pa la ni ser po'o/ /dbang la ni dmar po'o/ /mngon spyod la ni nag po'o/ /yam shing yang zhi ba la u dum+WA

ra la sogs pa'o ma can gyi shing las byas pa mtho gang rtse mor mnyam par bcad pa rtse mo gnyis pa la lo ma dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin du rgyas pa la yang yam shing de nyid la yang sboms su chang gang srid khru gang bya'o/ /dbang la ni a shwa ka dang bri yang ku la sogs pa'i shing la yang yam

shing la sogs zhi ba'i tshad du bya'o/ /mngon spyod la seng ldeng dang po son cha'i shing las sor brgyad pa'i tshad du bya'o/ / zhi ba la ni til la sogs pa'o/ /rgyas pa la ni zho dang 'bras la sogs pa'o/ /dbang la ni me tog gis so/ /dgug pa la ni ba lang gi sha yis so/ /mngon spyod

la ni sha chen gyis so/ /tshe bsring ba la ni dUr bas so/ /bsrung ba la ni ku sha mar du sbags pas so/ /hom gzar la yang las dang mthun pa'i phyag mtshan gyis mtshan pa'o/ /hom gzar dang dgang gzar dang sreg rdzas dang mchod yon la sogs pa dang / /sngags pa'i rgyan la sogs pa

thams cad las dang rjes su mthun par kha dog bsgyur ro/ /sngags pa'i stang stabs kyang zhi ba la ni byang du blta'o/ /rgyas pa la ni shar du blta'o/ /mngon spyod la ni ltor blta'o/ /dbang la ni nub tu blta'o/ /gsad pa la ni shar lhor ro / /bskam pa'am zhe sdang la ni lho nub tu'o/ /bskrad pa

dang dbye ba la ni nub byang du'o/ /rmongs pa dang rengs pa la ni byang shar du'o/ /zhi ba la ni 'jam zhing 'bol ba'i stan nang tshangs can no/ /rgyas pa la ni ku sha'i stan rgya dang dpangs su khru gang sor bzhi pa'o/ /dbang la ni pad+ma'i stan no/ /mngon spyod la ni stan med pa'am dur khrod kyi ras so/ /las

so so'i me lha yang zhi ba la ni pa ba ka sku mdog dkar po'i 'od kyis gzi brjid kyang dkar po 'phro ba'o/ /rgyas pa la ni me lha dbang chen zhes bya ba 'od dang kha dog ser po'o/ /dbang la ni me lha dmar po zhes bya ba 'od dang kha dog dmar po'o/ /mngon spyod la ni me lha rlung zhes bya ba 'od dang kha dog

nag po'o/ /de dag kyang spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa mchod phyir thogs pa dang ral pa'i thor tshugs dang ldan pa zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i me lha ni g.yas gnyis na dbyug to dang skyabs sbyin/ g.yon gnyis na gun+d+he dang bgrang phreng / dbang gi me lha ni g.yas pa na dbyug pa dang lcags kyu/ g.yon pa na

bgrang phreng dang zhags pa/ mngon spyod kyi me lha ni g.yas dang po na ral gri/ gnyis pa na dbyug pa/ g.yon dang po na zhags pa/ gnyis pa na phreng ba'o/ /las so so'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha yang zhi ba la ni rnam par snang mdzad gtso bor gyur pa thams cad sku mdog dkar

po'o/ /rgyas pa la ni rin chen 'byung ldan gtso bor gyur pa thams cad sku mdog ser po'o/ /dbang la ni 'od dpag med gtso bor gyur pa thams cad sku mdog dmar po'o/ /mngon spyod la ni mi bskyod pa gtso bor gyur pa thams cad sku mdog nag po'o/ /gzhan yang gshin rje gshed kyis skyes pa

dgug pa la sogs pa khro bo bcu'i las so so ni rang rang gi las gtso bor byas pa'i las dang rjes su dpag par bya'o/ /spyan gyis zhi bar bya ba dang shu li nis klu'i bu mo dgug pa dang / gnod mdzes kyis lha ma yin gyi bu mo dgug pa la sogs pa phal cher phyag rgya re re la sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de yang

dgug pa ni dbang gi khongs su bsdus nas bstan no/ /bskrad pa dang dbye ba dang gsad pa dang rengs pa dang rmugs pa ni mngon spyod kyi khongs su bsdus nas bstan pa'o/ /oM Tak+ki ni pA pa ka a g+na ye Tak+ki hUM dzaH/ zhi ba'i me lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM Tak+ki ni ma hi na kra a g+na ye Ta k+ki hUM dzaH/ rgyas

pa'i me lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM Tak+ki ni dza kA ma a g+na ye Tak+ki ni hUM dzaH/ dbang gi me lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM Tak+ki ni dzaHhUM baM hoH hUM kro d+ha te dza a g+na ye hUM dzaH/ mngon spyod kyi me lha spyan drang pa'i sngags so/ /de dag ni las so so'i sbyin sreg go/ /da ni las thams cad pa'i sbyin sreg

bshad de/ de yang pad+ma'i dbyibs lta bu'i thab khung bya ste/ rgyar khru gang sor bzhi zabs su de'i phyed/ thab khung gi phyi rol du sor bzhi dor ba kha khyer gyi rgya dang dpangs su sor bzhi yod pa/ thab kyi nang du pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad yod pa/ dbus kyi lte ba la rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa'am rtse dgu pas mtshan pa'o/ /

shar la sogs pa'i pad+ma la 'khor lo dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang ral gri'o/ /mtshams kyi pad+ma dag la ut+pal dkar po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang ljang gu bri'o/ /kha khyer gyi nang du sor bzhi dor ba la las dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha dog can pad+ma'i phreng ba lta bus bskor ro/ /de nyid la pad+ma'i dbyibs

lta bu zhes bya'o/ /nang du yang mtha' skor du rdo rje phreng bas bskor ro/ /phyi rol du yang kha khyer la rdo rje phreng bas bskor ro/ /grwa bzhir rdo rje bzhis brgyan pas thab khung nyid sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa lta bur brtag go/ /sngar bstan pa'i las so so'i thab khung ni re'u mig brgyad du brtag par bya ste/ de

yang phyag rgya dgod pa ni dkyil 'khor bsgyur ba'i dbang gis ci rigs su sbyar ro/ /'dir las thams cad pa'i me lha ni lnga pa mi ta zhes bya ba yin te las dang rjes su mthun par bskyed do/ /las thams cad pa'i lha ni lha thams cad pa'i bdag nyid yin pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid

do / /de yang thab kyi khor yug tu yang shing lo sngon pos g.yogs la de'i steng du rtswa ku sha sngon po gtsang ma'i bsang gtor gyis bsangs la/ mgo rtsa phan tshun du non pas g.yas skor du 'khor bar dgram mo/ /mchod rdzas ni g.yon du dgram / sreg rdzas g.yas su dgram/ de dag kun la/ oM badzra

sa twa a/ zhes pa lan gsum bzlas pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /hom gzar yang yu ba khru gang sor bzhi zabs su sor gnyis blugs gzar rgyar sor bzhi zabs su sor gnyis mchu la sor bzhi rin po che'am pad+ma'i dbyibs su byas pa'i dkyil du rdo rje sor gnyis pas mtshan pa'o/ /dgang gzar

sor gnyis zabs su sor gcig mchu la sor gnyis bya'o/ /gnyis ka'i dbus su ye shes kyi lha'i yig 'bru gcig bsam mo/ /de la 'di ni rdzas dbus ba'i sngags te/ oM namaHsa man+ta bu d+d+hA nA na a g+na ye swA hA/ dgang blugs kyi sngags so/ /oM a g+na ye swA hA/ mar gyi'o/ /oM sar+b+ba pA paM

da ha na badzrA a swA hA/ til gyi'o/ /oM badzra bi dzA ya swA hA/ so ba'i'o/ /oM badzra ma hA be gA ya swA hA/ nas kyi'o/ /oM badzra ma hA ba lA ya swA tA/ 'bras kyi'o/ /oM badzra g+ha smar ye swA hA/ gro'i'o/ /oM badzra a dz+nya ya swA hA/ u dum+WA ra'i'o/ /oM bo d+hi br-ik+Sha ya swA hA/ a shwa d+tha'i 'o / /oM badzra la tA ya

swA hA/ bla g+sha'i 'o/ /oM badzra ku be rA ya swA hA/ n+ya gro d+ha'i'o/ /oM badzra ha sa ka rA a swA hA/ a mra'i'o/ /yam shing de dag ni ardzu na la sogs pa'i shing legs pa gang rnyed pa la bzlas pa byas la mngon par sngags ti sbyin sreg bya'o/ /las kyi bye brag la zhi ba la ni swA hA'i mtha' dang

bcas pa'o/ /rgyas pa la ni bau ShaT he'i mtha' dang bcas pa'o/ /dbang la ni na ma hi'i mtha' dang bcas pa'o/ /dgug pa la ni dza'i mtha' dang bcas pa'o/ /mngon spyod la ni hUM gi mtha' dang bcas pa'o/ /sreg rdzas dbul ba'i rim pa ni mar la sogs pa zhu

ba'i rdzas ni zhal du'o/ /yam shing dang mi rus bsres pa'i phye ma dang bdug sbos ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du dbul lo/ /zho dang 'bras la sogs pa'i kha zas dang til dang 'thor 'thung ni phyag tu dbul lo/ /dri ni thugs kar ro/ /me tog ni spyi bo ru'o/ /zhabs bsil ni zhabs la'o/ /

mchod yon dang mar me ni mdun du'o/ /de la sngags pa rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa las dang rjes su mthun pas raM las bskyed pa'i me'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su a las gyur pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du gdan zhi ba la chu'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /rgyas ba la gser gyi

sa gzhi/ /dbang la ni me'i dkyil 'khor/ /mngon spyod la rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du las dang mthun pa'i me lha dam tshig sems dpa' ji lta ba bzhin bskyed la/ de nas/ oM ag+na ye ma hA te dza sarba kar+m+ma ma hA sa tA kaH / kA ru Na kr-i ta satwa ar+tha sA d+ha y+'asmiM sa n+ni b+ha ba/ zhes bya ba 'dis nam

mkha'i spyod yul nas ye shes kyi me lha thab kyi g.yas phyogs su spyan drangs la las thams cad pa'i chu yis bsang gtor byas la/ mchod yon gyi snod du mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dang / mchod pa dang bstod pa tshul bzhin du byas te/ de la oM dzaH hUM baM hoH khaM raM/ mchod yon gyi sngags

so/ /oM ni ri ti hUM khaM/ zhabs bsil gyi sngags so/ /oM AH badzra pu Sh+pe hUM swA hA/ me tog gi sngags so/ /oM AHbadzra d+hU pe A d+hU pe hUM swA hA/ spos kyi sngags so/ /oM AH badzra ga n+d+he hUM swA hA/ dri chab kyi sngags so/ /oM AHbadzra dI pe hUM swA hA/ mar me'i sngags so/ /oM AHbadzra nai bi d+ye hUM swA hA/

lha bshos kyi sngags so/ /de nas dgang blugs kyi sngags kyis mar dgang blugs gsum gsum dbul lo/ /drag po yin na shing mar gyi dgang blugs gsum gsum dbul lo/ /de ltar zhal du phul yang spyan gyi 'od zer gyis reg pa tsam gyis mnyes par 'gyur ba'i don gyis na spyan la

dbul lo/ /de ni spyir mnyes par bya'o / /de nas bye brag tu mnyes par bya ste/ de nas shing khru gang la ras kyis dkris la rgyal po dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / gdol pa'i khyim nas las dang mthun par me blangs la de spar te btsugs nas rlung yab kyis g.yab cing / oM badzra dz+wa la

gnas gsum du sku gsung thugs rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la/ de nas mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i mar dgang blugs gsum mam bdun dbul lo/ /de nas bkra shis kyi yam shing ngo / /de nas mar dang / til dang / zho dang / 'bras dang / ku sha rim pa bzhin du dbul

lo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha me lha ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM las nges par byung ba'i 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs par bsgoms la/ de nas/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga bA na san+ni da pany+tsa nas ma ye na tsa A kA sa pra tIts+tsha A hu pU dza nA dam bra sid+d+ha me/ zhes bya bas

bdud rtsi rnam pa lngas mnyes par bya ba dang / de ltar bstan pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor de la ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga bzhin du byas pa de la mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang / sbyin sreg gi khyad par gyis mnyes par byas la yi ge gsum gyis bdag gi thugs

kar bsdu'o/ /de nas 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho gas ji lta ba bzhin du mnyes par bya ste bzod pa gsol la/ las bcol la rang rang gi gnas su gtang ngo / /de nas me lha ye shes sems dpa' la mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dang / mchod

pa dang bstod pas mnyes par byas la mar dgang blugs gsum phul te sngags 'dis gshegs su gsol lo/ /oM kr-i to ba sar+b+ba satwa r+tha/ /sid+d+hi ma dat+tA ya thA nu ga /gats+tsha twAbu d+d+ha bi Sha yaM/ /pu na ra ga ma na yats+tsha muH/ zhes pa'o/ /de nas me lha dam tshig sems dpa' la tshogs kyi lhag ma dang sbyin sreg gi

lhag mas ci nus kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs par bya'o/ /de la dkyil 'khor gyi sngon du bgegs zhi bar byed na/ mi rus phye mas gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyi phreng bas bya'o/ /slob ma'i sdig pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir g.yon phyogs su tsog pur 'dug la/ slob ma'i sor

mo gung mo slob dpon gyi mtheb srin gyis bzung la til dang de'i sngags ci nus kyis zhi bar bya'o/ /de nas me lha de nyid thugs kar bsdu sbyin sreg gi yo byad de dag slob dpon gyi yin pas gzhan gyis spyad du mi rung ngo / /slob dpon gyis kyang ci rigs su spyad par bya'o/ /de nas dge ba'i

rtsa pa bsdo ba dang / smon lam btab ste thab kyi nang chus bkru bar bya'o/ /de dag ni sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// //de nas dkyil 'khor gyi mthar rab gnas kyi cho ga bya ste/ snga dro'i dus su slob dpon mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pas bla re dang rgyal mtshan dang spos dang me tog la

sogs pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad tshogs par bya ste/ mchod rten dang / tsha tsha dang / ri mor bris pa dang / lugs su blugs pa dang / 'bur du brkos pa la sogs pa la dkyil 'khor chen po'i byin gyis brlab pa'i cho gas ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis brlab te/ mchod pa thams cad kyis

mnyes par byas la/ 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du sems can gyi don gyi phyir rab tu bzhugs par gsol ba btab ste/ de nas sbyin sreg gis mnyes par byas nas bkra shis par byin gyis brlab pa 'di ni rab gnas kyi cho ga'o/ /thams cad stong pa zab cing phra bas na/ /rtog ge'i yul min

'khrul pas shes mi nus/ /des na de la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ /rim gnyis thabs kyi sngon 'gro'i cho ga yin/ /dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su b+hA Shi ta dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge

slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa // @##/ rgya gar skad du/ She ka tsa tu ra pra kA ra Na/ bod skad du/ dbang bzhi pa'i rab tu byed pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag

'tshal lo/ /dngos kun rnam dag 'od gsal rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i sku/ /'gro ba 'di kun thugs rjes khyab mdzad cir yang snang ba'i sku/ /ma lus yul du gyur pas khams gsum ro mnyam gnyis su med/ /zung 'jug gzod nas dbyer med rdo rje 'chang ba de la 'dud/ /de yi dngos grub

thob pa'i thabs ston pa/ /rdo rje 'chang dang tha dad med pa yi/ /lung dang man ngag brgyud pa ma nyams pa'i/ /bla ma rje btsun de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /dbang bzhi'i rab tu byed pa'i gdams ngag bri/ /rnyed dang bkur sti grags spangs byams dang ldan/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sgrol ba'i

thugs rje can/ /rgyud dag grol bar ston par dgyes pa po/ /mtho dman med par kun la mnyam por gzigs/ /dad ldan g.yo sgyu med cing gtang dka' gtong / /'khor bas yid byung mya ngan 'das pa sgrub/ /sman bcud mi 'bad dus kyi bdud rnams spong / /las kyi rkyen thub rtse gcig

bsam gtan byed/ /rten dang brten med ngo bo nyid/ /bdag byin brlab pa'i man ngag go/ /dang por maN+Dal lnga byas te/ /gdugs sogs me tog rin po che/ /kha dang mngar sogs ro drug dang / /glang po rta dang rin chen khyim/ /brgyad khri bzhi stong chos phung po/ /lha mi klu sogs bu mo

sdug /gnas lnga dag tu dbul bar bya/ /bdag byin rlobs shig gsol ba gdab/ /khong stong khyod kyi sku la med/ /bya ba la sogs tshigs bcad kyis/ /gsol ba gdab cing gnang ba sbyin/ /srung ba'i 'khor lo sngon 'gro bas/ /byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed/ /gzugs

brnyan lus dang byang chub sems/ /mtshan ma dbyibs dang sbas pa yum/ /zhal gyis bum pas dbang bskur te/ /phyi yi bzhi pa grangs kyi bzhi/ /sbas pa'i bzhi pa dga' bral bzhi/ /bde chen bzhi pa 'bras bu'i bzhi/ /de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yang / /yang gi sgra don kyang ldan phyir/ /

'di ni bde chen bzhi pa ste/ /dang por nga rgyal sgom du gzhug /nga ni ye nas rdo rje 'chang / /gnas skabs glo bur gyis bsgribs shing / /rang gi mtshan nyid ngo ma shes/ /dam pa'i drin gyis de mthong nas/ /rang gi lus la de nyid gnas/ /chu khams gser dang nam mkha' 'dra/

/de ltar mos ldan blo bzang la/ /spro ba skyed pa'i bum pa zhal/ /dang po lus 'di grub pa ni/ /cho ga gsum dang byang chub lnga'o/ /pha ma'i sa bon bar do'i sems/ /las kyi rlung la zhon nas ni/ /ma rig pa yis len par byed/ /chags dang phrag dog dbang

gis zhugs/ /mer mer ltar ltar yi ge lnga/ /gor gor mkhrang gyur mtshan ma lnga/ /yan lag rdzogs pa rigs lnga'i sku/ /sngon du shi ba chos sku ste/ /bar do longs spyod rdzogs pa'o/ /sa bon gsum 'dres zla ba yin/ /gnas skabs gnyis ni yi ge ste/ /gnas skabs

gnyis ni mtshan ma yin/ /gcig ni sprul pa'i sku rdzogs pa'o/ /rab tu byung zhing tshul khrims bsrung / /mgo zlum dpung zlum chos gos gyon/ /kham zas spangs shing bcud kyis 'tsho/ /thal sbyar gus pas mdo zlos byed/ /sa bcu'i bar du dka' thub bsrung / /de nas sngags

kyi spyad pa spyod/ /dbang thob don du gsol 'debs pa/ /sgyur byed rlung gis zlog par byed/ /bcom ldan dkyil 'khor sgor bltas te/ /thal sbyar gdong g.yogs bkrol bar byed/ /a haM sgra sgrogs gsol ba 'debs/ /nga rgyal byed pa'i lha yis te/ /sbas pa'i yum ni bum pa'o/ /

ku sha srung skud shis ba brjod/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i gnyid kyis nyal/ /bkra shis rdzas rnams lag thogs shing / /nam mkha' ca co'i sgras bkang nas/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /bde legs phun sum tshogs pa brjod/ /chu dang cod pan rdo rje dang / /dril bu ming gi dbang

rnams bskur/ /de nyid yang ni lan gnyis brjod/ /zas dang mal stan nu ma dang / /bshang gci la sogs brtul zhugs yin/ /pha dang ma yi longs spyod la/ /'di yis bdag po byed pa yin/ /pha dang ma dang gzhan pa la/ /rag ma lus bar rang stobs ldan/ /rin chen rta

dang glang po khyim/ /rjes su gnas nas rang dbang thob/ /'di ni bum pa'i bzhi pa'o/ /sme sha can sogs bu mo rnams/ /rgyas shing smin par gyur pa la/ /gzhan gyis spro ba skyed byed cing / /gzhan dag snyoms par 'jug pa la/ /dga' dang mos pas 'jug byed cing / /skye'o cog ces

mos skyed pa/ /'di ni gsang ba'i bzhi pa yin/ /phyag rgya dang ni lhan cig tu/ /'o dang 'khyud pa 'jib par byed/ /snyoms par zhugs nas srub par byed/ /snang ba rang bzhin bcas pa nub/ /stong pa zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /sems la dmigs pa dang po'o/ /rtsa rnams kun

kyang dung khang nas/ /'dod chags chen po'i mes bzhu ste/ /a ba d+hU tI'i sgor zhugs shing / /k+Sha yi sgo ni ma phye bar/ /mched pa rang bzhin bcas pa nub/ /shin tu stong pa zhes brjod do/ /sems la dmigs pa gnyis pa yin/ /ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug cing / /yi ge k+Sha

yi sgo phye ba/ /bde chen bde ba chen po ni/ /skad cig tsam la nyams myong ba/ /dpal du yid ches byed pa yin/ /log rtog mtshan ma ma lus 'gog /nyer thob rang bzhin dang bcas nub/ /stong pa chen po zhes brjod do / /sems la dmigs pa gsum pa'o/ /gong ma de la

rtog dpyod byed/ /glang po che yi lcags kyu 'dra/ /mchog dang dga' bral dbus dag tu/ /mtshan nyid dmigs la brtan par gyis/ /thun nam zla phyed zla ba lor/ /bskal par ye shes che la sbyor/ /stong pa gsum ni ro mnyam pa/ /thams cad stong pa 'od gsal ba/ /sems la

dmigs pa bzhi pa'o/ /'di ni gsum pa'i bzhi pa yin/ /rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /dbugs gtong rngub pa ma yin te/ /spyan phye btsums pa ma yin no/ /dgye ba ma yin sbu ba min/ /gsung ba ma yin mi gsung min/ /phyir ni yul la

mi dpyod cing / /nang du sems la mi rtog go/ /sems gang gis ni byis pa rnams/ /'khor ba'i bcing bas 'ching bar 'gyur/ /sems gang gis ni rnal 'byor pa/ /bde gshegs gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ /bya ba thams cad blos btang la/ /gang ltar gnas pa'i don la gzhag /ma bcos

pa nyid ma nor ba/ /bde ba chen po rang so nyid/ /don du snang ba rang bzhin med/ /dngos por gsal ba rtog pa med/ /chu dang rnyog ma de bzhin no/ /bying zhing lci ba gzengs bstod cing / /'thor zhing 'phyar ba rang sor gzhag /cung zad cung zad goms byas pas/ /gong nas gong du khyad par

'gro /mthar ni mi rtog ting 'dzin dag /lhun gyis grub pa thob par 'gyur/ /sems kyi 'jur bu btang la gzhag /bla ma nyid kyang mnyam bzhag la/ /slob ma byin gyis brlab par bya/ /thun gyi nges pa yod min te/ /ji tsam gnas kyi bar du gzhag /'dod

pa'i longs spyod kun bsten cing / /lus kyi 'byung ba ro yang mnyam/ /bzhi pa'i dbang bskur cho ga'o/ /de yi don ni bshad bya ste/ /e waM ma yA'i yi ge bzhin/ /don bzhi dang ni sbyar bar bya/ /rgyud rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa'o/ /e ni 'jug pa waM ni gnas/ /ma ni srung ba yA ni

grogs/ /e ni las dang waM ni chos/ /ma ni mu dra yA dam tshig /e ni snang ba stong pa ste/ /waM ni mched pa shin tu stong / /ma ni nyer thob chen po stong / /yA ni ro mnyam thams cad stong / /e ni ma thob thob par byed/ /waM ni thob pa brtan par byed/ /ma ni gong nas gong du 'gro/ /

yA ni tshe 'dir rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /e ni rgan po dar ma dang / /gzhon dang lang tsho bab pa'o/ /de bzhin bad kan mkhris pa dang / /rlung dang 'du ba cha mnyam pa'o/ /de bzhin gti mug zhe sdang dang / /'dod chags dug gsum cha mnyam pa'o/ /ti ba skyes bu las zin dang / /gzhon pa'i

don dang dpyang thag chad/ /go rims bzhin du shes par bya/ /e ka ka la zhes pa ste/ /rang gi rgyud la cher te ltos / /skyes bu ma bcos ngang du gnas/ /bla ma dam pas mi rta sbyar/ /rang dbang med par rnam rtog phrogs/ /waM ni mar me rgya mtsho dang / /dig pa'i rmi lam khyung chen 'dra//

brtan par zung la mnyam par zhog /rjes thob bzhi ni sgyu ma bzhin/ /ma ni nor bu so ga'i be'u/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor lo 'dra/ /legs par spyod la rtag tu bsrung / /ya ni seng ge glang chen dang / /smyon pa'am lceb pa lta bu yin/ /mgon po'i tsaR+ya dus dang sbyar/ /sngags kyi tsaR+ya

gdod nas spyod/ /bzhi pa'i cho ga'i gdams pa ste/ /rigs dang dus dang gnas dang ni/ /bya ba spyod pa 'di ma nges/ /rin chen lta bu'i gang zag la/ /na so 'du ba nyon mongs sbyar/ /lo ni zla ba bcu gnyis pa'o/ /bco lnga na ni mngon sangs rgyas/ /rten can las la brten pa ste/ /las

ni lus ngag yid kyi las/ /de la rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yin/ /dga' bral la ni bzhi pa brjod/ /sems la dmigs pa ji bzhin du/ /sgom pa sems la dmigs pa ste/ /rten can zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /rten med rang lus thabs ldan nam/ /'khor lo bzhi dang 'khor lo gnyis/ /

rdo rje sems dpa'i dbab thabs sam/ /rnam par shes pa thod sbyor ram/ /yi ge hUM gi dbab thabs sam/ /gtum po'am mkha' 'gro'i byin rlabs sam/ /bla ma dus thabs bsten pas so/ /nyams su myong ba bzhi pa ste/ /rnam shes rlung dang ro gcig pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid ni rdo rje 'chang / /

yan lag bdun dang ldan pa ste/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa kha sbyor bde chen rang bzhin med/ /snying rjes nges gang rgyun mi 'chad cing 'gog pa med/ /lha la dmigs shing 'dod la spyod/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rgyu ru bshad/ /las kyi phyag rgya rang 'od yum/ /ye shes phyag

rgyas rgyas btab cing / /dkyil 'khor sgrub dang dbang gnyis dus/ /tshogs dang spyod pa ro mnyam dus/ /yum dang bcas pa'i rgyu ru bshad/ /bde la stong pas rgyas btab cing / /ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa/ /lha dang mi yi bde ba las/ /bsdus byas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /

bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /dngos don rang gi mtshan nyid las/ /gud na yod pa ma yin na/ /lha sogs ye shes snang ba las/ /gzhan du dmigs pa smos ci dgos/ /chu yi nang gi zla ba ni/ /bden pa ma yin brdzun pa min/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yang / /rang

bzhin med lugs de ltar snang / /rnam dag tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang / /smon lam snying rje gang ba'i rgyu/ /thog mtha' med pa'i rdo rje sems/ /dus dang phyogs ris rnam par spangs/ /chu bo'i gzhung ltar rgyun mi 'chad/ /'di dang 'di la bya min bral/ /nyon mongs la sogs 'dod lnga

rnams/ /ma bkag bde chen rgyan du shes/ /gser 'gyur rtsi bzhin shes pas 'grub/ /bde chen bde ba chen po'i sku/ /rang snang rig mas nyer brgyan pa/ /'og min gnas su dus rtag tu/ /mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar bas bzhugs/ /gang dang gang gis 'dul 'gyur ba/ /de de

bzhin du so sor snang / /mos pa'i dbang gis tha dad pa/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul bar mdzad/ /rgyud gzhan dag las bshad pa ni/ /spang bya gsum dang ma rig pa/ /sbyong byed smin byed dbang bzhi'o / /grol byed rgyud dang sngags dang chos/ /gsang ba'i rim pas

bzhi par 'dod/ /'di nyid yi ge spyi dang sbas/ /mthar thug yin pas bzhi par 'dod/ /mkha' 'dra chos sku stong pa las/ /rtog med ye shes 'ja' 'dra ba/ /rlung dang ye shes ting 'dzin gyis/ /'bad dang bral bas lhun gyis grub/ /dka' thub dka' spyad 'dir mi dgos/ /dka'

thub sdom pa mi bzad pa/ /lus skams nas ni sems gdungs nas/ /sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig byed par zad/ /khrus dang gtsang sbras gdung ba skyed/ /'dod pa lnga ni ma spangs par/ /dka' thub kyis ni ma gdungs par/ /bde bas byang chub tshe 'dir 'thob/ /bskal pa grangs med

gsum du ni/ /lus dang srog la ma bltas kyang / /bde ba chen po rnyed par dka'/ /phyag rgya chen po rdo rje ye shes kyi / /dbang bskur bzhi pa'i gdams pa byas pa yin/ /'gro kun byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor mthong nas ni/ /zung 'jug rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob bar shog /dbang

bzhi pa'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon nA gA rdzu nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAn+ti gar+b+ha dang bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur ba'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi tsit+ta bi ba ra Na nA ma/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems kyi 'grel

pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/ /phung po khams dang skye mched kyi/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa/ /chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas/ /rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /zhes

bya ba 'byung ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis ji ltar byang chub chen por thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang sems can ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyung ba rnams

dbugs dbyung ba dang / /yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir dus 'di nas bzung nas snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du byang chub chen por sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgor spyad pa spyod pa rnams

kyis de ltar kun rdzob kyi rnam pas byang chub kyi sems smon pa'i rang bzhin can bskyed nas/ don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i stobs kyis bskyed par bya ba yin pas de'i phyir de'i rang bzhin bshad par bya'o/ /byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid dngos/ /dpal ldan rdo rje rnams

btud de/ /byang chub sems kyi bsgom pa ni/ /srid pa 'jig rten bdag gis bshad/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub sems/ /bdag dang phung sogs rnam rig gi/ /rtog pa rnams kyis ma bsgribs pa/ /rtag tu stong nyid mtshan nyid bzhed/ /snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /

'bad pas bsgom par bya ba yin/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi / /byang chub sems 'di rtag tu bsgom / /mu stegs can gyis gang brtags pa/ /bdag de rigs pas rnam dpyad na/ /phung rnams kun gyi nang rnams ni / /gang zhig gnas kyang rnyed ma yin/ /phung rnams

yod kyi de rtag min/ /de yang bdag gi ngo bo min/ /gang yang rtag dang mi rtag gnyis/ /rten dang brten pa'i dngos po med/ /bdag ces bya ste yod min na/ /byed po zhes bya ga la rtag /chos can yod na chos rnams la/ /'jig rten na ni spyod pa 'jug /gang phyir rtag pa don byed pa//

rim dang cig car gyis min pa/ /de phyir phyi rol nang du ni/ /rtag pa'i dngos de med pa nyid/ /gal te nus na ci ste ltos/ /de ni cig car dngos 'byin 'gyur/ /gang zhig dngos gzhan la ltos la/ /de ni rtag dang nus ldan min/ /gal te dngos na rtag min te/ /dngos rnams

rtag tu skad cig phyir/ /gang phyir mi rtag dngos po la/ /byed pa po nyid bkag pa med/ /bdag sogs bral ba'i 'jig rten 'di/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /gzung 'dzin blo yis 'joms par 'gyur/ /phan par bzhed pa rnams kyis ni/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du

shes dang / /'du byed rnam shes phung po lnga/ /de ltar nyan thos rnams la gsungs/ /rkang gnyis mchog gis rtag tu yang / /gzugs ni dbu ba rdos 'drar snang / /tshor ba chu yi chu bur 'dra/ /'du shes smig rgyu dang mtshungs shing / /'du byed chu shing

dang 'dra la/ /rnam shes sgyu ma lta bu zhes/ /phung po bstan pa 'di lta bu/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gsungs/ /'byung chen bzhi yi rang bzhin can/ /gzugs kyi phung por rab tu bshad/ /lhag ma gzugs med nyid du ni/ /med na mi 'byung phyir na 'grub/ /de dag rnams

kyi mig gzugs sogs/ /khams rnams bshad pa de dag nyid/ /skye mched dag ni gzung ba dang / /'dzin par yang ni shes par bya/ /gzugs rdul dbang shes skyed min te/ /de ni dbang po las 'das yin/ /'dus pas de rnams skyed byed na/ /tshogs pa de yang mi 'dod do/ /

phyogs kyi dbye bas phye ba yis/ /rdul phran la yang dbye ba mthong / /gang la cha shas kyis brtags pa/ /der ni rdul phran ji ltar 'thad/ /phyi rol don ni rnam gcig la/ /tha dad shes pa 'jug par 'gyur/ /yid 'ong gzugs ni gang yin pa/ /de nyid gzhan la gzhan du 'gyur//

bud med gzugs ni gcig pu la/ /ro dang 'dod bya bza' ba la/ /kun rgyu chags can khyi rnams bzhin/ /rnam par rtog pa gsum yin no/ /don mtshungs pa yis don byed pa/ /rmi lam gnod pa bzhin min nam/ /rmi lam sad pa'i gnas skabs la/ /don byed pa la khyad par med//

gzung dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo yis/ /rnam shes snang ba gang yin pa/ /rnam shes las ni tha dad par/ /phyi rol don ni 'ga' yang med/ /de phyir dngos po'i ngo bor ni/ /phyi don rnam pa kun du med/ /rnam shes so sor snang ba 'di/ /gzugs kyi rnam par snang bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar skye

bo sems rmongs pas/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za yi/ /grong khyer la sogs mthong ba ltar/ /de bzhin gzugs sogs snang ba yin/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /phung po khams sogs bstan pa yin/ /sems tsam po la gnas nas ni/ /skal chen rnams kyis de yang

spangs/ /rnam par shes par smra ba la/ /sna tshogs 'di ni sems su grub/ /rnam shes rang bzhin gang zhe na/ /da ni de nyid bshad bya ste/ /'di dag thams cad sems tsam zhes/ /thub pas bstan pa gang mdzad de/ /byis pa rnams kyis skrag pa ni/ /spang ba'i phyir yin de nyid min//

kun brtags dang ni gzhan dbang dang / /yongs su grub pa 'di nyid ni/ /stong nyid bdag nyid gcig pu yi/ /ngo bo sems la brtag pa yin/ /theg chen dga' ba'i bdag nyid la/ /chos la bdag med mnyam pa nyid/ /sems ni gdod nas ma skyes te/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni

mdor bsdus gsungs/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa pa rnams kyis/ /rang gi sems kyi dbang byas te/ /gnas yongs gyur nas dag pa'i sems/ /so so rang rig spyod yul brjod/ /'das pa gang yin de ni med/ /ma 'ongs pa ni thob pa min/ /gnas phyir gnas ni yongs gyur

ba/ /da lta ba la ga la yod/ /de ji ltar de ltar snang min/ /ji ltar snang de de ltar min / /rnam shes bdag med ngo bo ste/ /rten gzhan rnam par shes pa med/ /ji ltar khab len dang nye bas/ /lcags ni myur du yongs su 'khor/ /de la sems ni yod min te/ /sems

dang ldan zhing snang bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin kun gzhi'i rnam shes ni/ /bden min bden pa bzhin du ni/ /gang tshe 'gro 'ong g.yo bar 'gyur/ /de tshe srid pa 'dzin par byed/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho dang ni shing / /sems ni med kyang g.yo bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin kun gzhi'i rnam shes ni//

lus brten nas ni g.yo ba yin/ /lus med na ni rnam par shes/ /yod pa min zhes yongs rtog na/ /de yi so so rang rig nyid/ /ci 'dra zhes kyang brjod par gyis/ /so so rang rig nyid brjod pas/ /de ni dngos po nyid du brjod/ /'di de yin zhes brjod pa ni/ /nus min

zhes kyang brjod pa yin/ /rang la nges bzhin gzhan dag la/ /nges pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/ /rtag tu 'khrul pa med par ni/ /mkhas rnams rab tu 'jug pa yin/ /shes pas shes bya rtogs pa ste/ /shes bya med par shes pa med/ /de ltar na ni rig bya dang / /rig byed

med ces cis mi 'dod/ /sems ni ming tsam yin pa ste/ /ming las gzhan du 'ga' yang med/ /ming tsam du ni rnam rig blta/ /ming yang rang bzhin med pa yin/ /nang ngam de bzhin phyi rol lam/ /yang na gnyis ka'i bar dag tu/ /rgyal ba

rnams kyis sems ma rnyed/ /de phyir sgyu ma'i rang bzhin sems/ /kha dog dbyibs kyi dbye ba'am/ /gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa'am/ /skyes pa bud med ma ning sogs/ /ngo bo sems ni gnas pa min/ /mdor na sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ /gzigs par ma gyur gzigs

mi 'gyur/ /rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin can/ /ji lta bur na gzigs par 'gyur/ /dngos po zhes bya rnam rtog yin/ /rnam rtog med pa stong pa yin/ /gang du rnam rtog snang gyur pa/ /der ni stong nyid ga la yod/ /rtog bya rtog byed rnam pa'i sems/ /de bzhin gshegs

rnams kyis ma gzigs/ /gang na rtog bya rtog byed yod/ /der ni byang chub yod ma yin/ /mtshan nyid med cing skye ba med/ /yod gyur ma yin ngag lam bral/ /mkha' dang byang chub sems dang ni/ /byang chub gnyis med mtshan nyid can/ /byang chub snying po la bzhugs pa'i/ /

bdag nyid chen po'i sangs rgyas dang / /brtse ldan kun gyis dus kun du/ /stong pa mkha' dang mtshungs par mkhyen/ /de phyir chos rnams kun gyi gzhi/ /zhi zhing sgyu ma dang mtshungs par/ /gzhi med srid pa 'jig byed pa'i/ /stong pa nyid 'di rtag tu bsgom/ /skye med dang ni stong

nyid dang / /bdag med ces byar stong pa nyid/ /bdag nyid dman pa gang sgom pa/ /de de sgom par byed pa min/ /dge dang mi dge'i rnam rtog gi/ /rgyun chad pa yi mtshan nyid can/ /stong nyid sangs rgyas kyis gsungs gzhan/ /de dag stong pa nyid mi bzhed/ /sems la dmigs

pa med pa yi/ /gnas pa nam mkha'i mtshan nyid yin/ /de dag stong nyid bsgom pa ni/ /nam mkha' bsgom par bzhed pa yin/ /stong nyid seng ge'i sgra yis ni/ /smra ba thams cad skrag par mdzad/ /gang dang gang du de dag bzhugs/ /de dang der ni stong nyid 'gyur/ /gang gi rnam

shes skad cig ma/ /de yi de ni rtag ma yin/ /sems ni mi rtag nyid yin na/ /stong pa nyid du ji ltar 'gal/ /mdor na sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ /sems ni mi rtag nyid bzhed na/ /de dag sems ni stong nyid du/ /ci yi phyir na bzhed mi 'gyur/ /thog ma nyid nas sems kyi ni/ /

rang bzhin rtag tu med par 'gyur/ /dngos po rang bzhin gyis grub pa/ /rang bzhin med nyid brjod pa min/ /de skad brjod na sems kyi ni/ /bdag gi gnas pa spangs pa yin/ /rang gi rang bzhin las 'das pa/ /de ni chos rnams chos ma yin/ /ji ltar bu ram mngar ba dang //

me yi rang bzhin tsha ba bzhin/ /de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid du 'dod/ /stong nyid rang bzhin du brjod pas/ /gang zhig chad par smra ba min/ /des ni rtag pa nyid du yang / /'ga' zhig smras pa ma yin no/ /ma rig nas brtsams rga ba yi / /mthar

thug yan lag bcu gnyis kyi/ /brten nas byung ba'i bya ba ni/ /kho bo rmi lam sgyu 'drar 'dod/ /yan lag bcu gnyis 'khor lo 'di/ /srid pa'i lam du 'khor ba ste/ /de las gzhan du sems can gang / /las 'bras spyod par 'dod pa med/ /ji ltar me long la brten nas//

bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang gyur pa/ /de ni der 'pho ma yin zhing / /de med par yang de yod min/ /de bzhin phung po nying mtshams sbyor/ /srid pa gzhan du skye ba dang / /'pho ba med par mkhas rnams kyis/ /rtag tu nges par bya ba yin/ /mdor na stong pa'i chos rnams la/ /chos rnams

stong pa skye bar 'gyur/ /byed po las 'bras longs spyod pa/ /kun rdzob tu ni rgyal bas bstan/ /ji ltar rnga yi sgra dang ni/ /de bzhin myu gu tshogs pas bskyed/ /phyi yi rten cing 'brel 'byung ba/ /rmi lam sgyu ma dang mtshungs 'dod/ /chos rnams rgyu las skyes pa ni/ /nam yang 'gal

bar mi 'gyur te/ /rgyu ni rgyu nyid kyis stong pas/ /de ni skye ba med par rtogs/ /chos rnams kyi ni skye ba med/ /stong nyid yin par rab tu bshad/ /mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni/ /chos kun zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /de nyid ji bzhin bshad pas na/ /kun rdzob rgyun ni 'chad mi 'gyur/ /kun

rdzob las ni tha dad par/ /de nyid dmigs pa ma yin te/ /kun rdzob stong pa nyid du bshad/ /stong pa kho na kun rdzob yin/ /med na mi 'byung nges pa'i phyir/ /byas dang mi rtag ji bzhin no/ /kun rdzob nyon mongs las las byung / /las ni sems las byung ba

yin/ /sems ni bag chags rnams kyis bsags/ /bag chags bral na bde ba ste/ /bde ba'i sems ni zhi ba nyid/ /sems zhi ba ni rmongs mi 'gyur/ /rmongs med de nyid rtogs pa ste/ /de nyid rtogs pas grol thob 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyid dang yang dag mtha'/ /mtshan

ma med dang don dam nyid/ /byang chub sems mchog de nyid dang / /stong nyid du yang bshad pa yin/ /gang dag stong nyid mi shes pa/ /de dag thar pa'i rten ma yin/ /'gro drug srid pa'i btson rang ni/ /rmongs pa de dag 'khor bar 'gyur/ /de ltar stong pa nyid 'di ni/ /rnal

'byor pa yis bsgom byas na/ /gzhan gyi don la chags pa'i blo/ /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /gang dag pha dang ma dang ni/ /gnyen bshes gyur pas bdag la sngon/ /phan pa byas par gyur pa yi / /sems can de dag rnams la ni/ /byas pa gzo bar gyur par bya/ /srid pa'i

btson rar sems can ni/ /nyon mongs me yis gdungs rnams la/ /bdag gis sdug bsngal byin pa ltar/ /de bzhin bde ba sbyin par rigs/ /'jig rten bde 'gro ngan 'gro yis/ /'dod dang mi 'dod 'bras bu de/ /sems can rnams la phan pa dang / /gnod pa las ni 'byung

bar 'gyur/ /sems can bsten pas sangs rgyas kyi / /go 'phang bla med nyid 'gyur na/ /lha dang mi yi longs spyod gang / /tshangs dang dbang po drag po dang / /'jig rten skyong bas bsten de dag /sems can phan pa tsam zhig gis/ /ma drangs ba ni 'gro gsum 'dir/ /'ga' yang med

la mtshar ci yod/ /sems dmyal dud 'gro yi dwags su/ /sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma'i dngos/ /sems can rnams kyis myong ba gang / /de ni sems can gnod las byung / /bkres skom phan tshun rdeg pa dang / /gzir ba yi ni sdug bsngal nyid/ /bzlog par dka' zhing zad med de//

sems can gnod pa'i 'bras bu yin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid dang / /bde 'gro dang ni ngan 'gro gang / /sems can dag gi rnam smin kyang / /ngo bo gnyis su shes par bya/ /dngos po kun gyis bsten bya zhing / /rang gi lus bzhin bsrung bar bya/ /sems can rnams la

chags bral ba/ /dug bzhin 'bad pas spang bar bya/ /nyan thos rnams ni chags bral bas/ /byang chub dman pa thob min nam/ /sems can yongs su ma dor bas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byang chub thob/ /de ltar phan dang mi phan pa'i/ /'bras bu 'byung pa dpyad pa na/ /de dag

skad cig gcig kyang ni/ /rang don chags shing ji ltar gnas/ /snying rjes brtan pa'i rtsa ba can/ /byang sems myu gu las byung ba/ /gzhan don gcig 'bras byang chub ni/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams sgom par byed/ /gang zhig bsgoms pas brtan pa ni/ /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gyis bred

nas/ /bsam gtan bde ba dor nas kyang / /mnar med par yang 'jug par byed/ /'di ni ngo mtshar 'di bsngags 'os/ /'di ni dam pa'i tshul lugs mchog /de dag rnams kyi rang lus dang / /nor rnams byin pa ngo mtshar min/ /chos rnams stong pa 'di shes nas/ /las dang 'bras bu sten pa gang //

de ni ngo mtshar bas ngo mtshar/ /rmad du byung bas rmad du byung / /sems can bskyab pa'i bsam pa can/ /de dag srid pa'i 'dam skyes kyang / /de byung nyes pas ma gos pa/ /chu yi pad+ma'i 'dab ma bzhin/ /kun bzang la sogs rgyal ba'i sras/ /nyon mongs bud shing bsregs mod

kyi/ /de ltar snying rjes brlan gyur cing / /snying rje'i dbang du gyur pa rnams/ /gshegs dang bltams dang rol pa dang / /khab nas 'byung dang dka' ba spyod/ /byang chub che dang bdud sde 'joms/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /lha rnams kun la zhugs pa dang / /de bzhin du ni mya

ngan las/ /'das pa ston par mdzad pa yin/ /tshangs dang dbang po khyab 'jug dang / /drag sogs gzugs su sprul mdzad nas/ /'gro ba 'dul ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /thugs rje'i rang bzhin can gar mdzad/ /srid pa'i lam la skyo rnams la/ /ngal so'i don du theg pa che/ /'byung

ba'i ye shes gnyis po yang / /gsungs pa yin te don dam min/ /ji srid sangs rgyas kyis ma bskul// de srid ye shes lus dngos can/ /ting 'dzin myos pas rgyal 'gyur ba/ /nyan thos de dag gnas par 'gyur/ /bskul na sna tshogs gzugs

kyis ni/ /sems can don la chags gyur cing / /bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags na / /sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /gnyis kyi bag chags yod pa'i phyir/ /bag chags sa bon brjod pa yin/ /sa bon de dngos tshogs pa ni/ /srid pa'i myu gu skyed par byed/ /

'jig rten mgon rnams kyis bstan pa/ /sems can bsam dbang rjes 'gro ba/ /'jig rten du ni thabs mang po/ /rnam pa mang po tha dad 'gyur/ /zab cing rgya che'i dbye ba dang / /la lar gnyis ka'i mtshan nyid can/ /tha dad bstan pa yin yang ni/ /stong dang gnyis med tha dad min/ /

gzungs rnams dang ni sa rnams dang / /sangs rgyas pha rol phyin gang dag /de dag byang chub sems kyi char/ /kun mkhyen rnams kyis gsungs pa yin/ /lus ngag yid kyis rtag par ni/ /de ltar sems can don byed pa/ /stong nyid rtsod par smra rnams la/ /chad pa'i rtsod pa nyid yod

min/ /'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa la/ /bdag nyid che de mi gnas pa/ /de phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das 'dir bshad/ /snying rje ro gcig bsod nams gyur/ /stong nyid ro ni mchog gyur pa/ /bdag dang gzhan don bsgrub don du/ /gang 'thung de dag rgyal

sras yin/ /dngos po kun gyis de la 'dud/ /srid pa gsum na rtag mchod 'os/ /sangs rgyas gdung ni 'tshob don du/ /'jig rten 'dren pa de dag bzhugs/ /byang chub sems 'di theg chen po/ /mchog ni yin par bshad pa ste/ /mnyam par gzhag pa'i 'bad pa yis/ /

byang chub sems ni bskyed par gyis/ /rang dang gzhan don bsgrub don du/ /srid na thabs gzhan yod ma yin/ /byang chub sems ni ma gtogs par / /sangs rgyas kyis sngar thabs ma gzigs/ /byang chub sems bskyed tsam gyis ni/ /bsod nams phung po gang thob pa/ /gal te

gzugs can yin na ni/ /nam mkha' gang ba las ni lhag /skyes bu gang zhig skad cig tsam/ /byang chub sems ni sgom byed pa/ /de yi bsod nams phung po ni/ /rgyal ba yis kyang bgrang mi spyod/ /nyon mongs med pa'i rin chen sems/ /'di ni nor mchog gcig pu ste/ /nyon

mongs bdud sogs chom rkun gyis/ /gnod min 'phrog par bya ba min/ /ji ltar 'khor bar sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam ni/ /mi g.yo de ltar blo nyid ni/ /byang chub sems gzhol rnams kyis bya/ /ngo mtshar gyis kyang khyed cag gis/ /ji ltar bshad pa la

'bad kyi / /de rjes kun bzang spyod pa ni/ /rang nyid kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /rgyal mchog rnams kyis bstod pa'i byang chub sems ni bstod byas pa'i/ /bsod nams mtshungs med deng du bdag gis thob pa gang yin pa/ /de yis srid pa'i rgya mtsho dba' klong nang du nub pa yi/ /sems

can rkang gnyis dbang pos bsten pa'i lam du 'gro bar shog /byang chub sems kyi 'grel pa slob dpon bdag nyid chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po gu Na A ka ra dang / lo tsA ba rab zhi bshes gnyen gnyen gyis bsgyur cing zhus/ /slad kyi rgya gar gyi

mkhan po ka na ka wa rma dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba pa chab nyi ma grags kyis bcos pa'o // // @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi tsi t+ta bi ba ra Na/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems kyi 'grel pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i 'grel

pa bshad par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad sems kyis rnam par brtags pa'o zhes gsungs pas re zhig sems ni de nyid kyi rang bzhin ci zhig ces nges par rtog pa na/ dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par

spangs/ /chos bdag med par mnyam nyid pas/ /rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /smras pa 'di yi don ci yin zhe na/ brjod pa/ dngos po thams cad dang bral ba / /zhes te dngos po'i sgras bdag la sogs pa mngon par brjod do/ /

'di skad du sems de ni bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ma yin no/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la bya ba'i mtshan nyid can yod pa ma yin pa'i

phyir ro/ /de nyid kyi phyir bdag la sogs pa'i dngos po yod pa ma yin na/ sems de'i rang bzhin du gyur pa lta ga la yod ces smras par 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir dngos po thams cad dang bral zhing bdag tu 'dzin pa tsam gyis yang dag par bskyed pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad bdag tu 'dzin

pas yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir sems ni de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhe na/ sems de ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir/ phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'di ltar re zhig phung po la

sogs pa nyid kyi dngos po don dam par ma dmigs na/ sems de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ ji ltar zhe na/ re zhig gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams dngos po med pa nyid de/ gzugs kyi phung po ni 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i tshogs so/ /'byung ba ni bzhi ste/ sa

dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung ngo / /'byung ba las gyur pa lnga ste/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'o/ /sa la sogs pa 'byung ba rnams dang / gzugs la sogs pa 'byung ba las gyur pa de dag re re zhing tha dad pa'i dngos po nyid du ma dmigs te/ gang du gcig tu

yod pa der gzhan yang yod pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i phyir gzugs ni ming tsam du kun du brtags pa'o/ /gzugs kyi phung po ni gzugs kyi phung pos stong zhes gsungs pa las ni gzugs kyi phung po yang yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba'i phung po yongs su ma grub ste/ ji lta zhe na/

tshor ba rnam pa gsum mo/ /bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal ma yin zhing bde ba yang ma yin pa de dag phan tshun ltos pa'i phyir te/ sdug bsngal la ltos nas bde ba dang / bde ba la ltos nas sdug bsngal du 'dogs par byed do/ /chos gang zhig gcig pur gnas pa dmigs

pa med pa de ni rdzas nyid du yod pa yin te/ ring po dang thung ngu bzhin no/ /gzhan du tshor ba ni rnam pa gnyis te/ lus las byung ba dang / sems las byung ba'o zhes par yang re zhig lus ni gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus pa'i phyir ma dmigs so/ /de'i phyir lus med pa'i phyir lus las

byung ba'i tshor ba ma grub bo/ /sems kyang yul na mi gnas pa/ phyogs na mi gnas pa/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rab tu mi gnas pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par mi rig par gsungs na/ tshor ba de ni ci 'dra zhig de'i phyir sems las byung ba yang ma grub po/ /de'i phyir

tshor ba'i phung po ni tshor ba'i phung pos stong ngo zhes gsungs pa las na/ tshor ba'i phung po yang yongs su ma grub bo/ /'du shes kyi phung po yang ming tsam gyis dngos po nyid de/ 'du shes ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can yin la/ de ltar re zhig gang dag la mtshan mar gzung bar bya ba'i

dngos po yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma can yang yod pa ma yin no/ /'du shes kyi phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung pos stong ngo zhes gsungs pa las na 'du shes kyi phung po yang yongs su ma grub bo/ /'du byed kyi phung po yang yongs su ma grub ste tshogs pa tsam gyi phyir

ro/ /'du byed kyi phung po ni tshor ba dang / sems pa dang 'du shes dang 'dun pa dang reg pa dang blo dang / dran pa dang yid la byed pa dang mos pa la sogs pa mtshungs par ldan pa rnams dang / sa dang chu dang me dang rlung la sogs pa'i skye ba la sogs pa mtshungs par mi ldan pa dag la brjod na/

sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang skye ba la sogs pa dag kyang re re zhing la skye ba yod pa ma yin no/ /'du byed kyi phung po ni las kyi mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir yang med pa nyid do/ /byed pa po med pa'i phyir bya ba yang dngos po med do/ /'du byed kyi phung po ni 'du byed kyi phung po'i dngos
